descriptionHTML:
Add life to your card game in this solitaire classic with a twist! You’ll play on the fairway, but don’t expect to improve your golf swing. Simply play one card up or one card down from your draw pile, it’s that easy! Stay on par by removing the most cards in each hand. Your bag of golf clubs each represents a playable numbered card to use as part of your strategy. Make sure you look for the gold Midas Club™ which plays like a wild card! You can also use power-up cards like the shuffle, preview, and mulligan (undo move) to aide in your strategy. Expertly play through rough hazards, sand traps, and rain hazards when you get hazard power-ups. With a little patience you can develop the skills to play like a pro!

Fairway is Easy to Play!
❤️Simply play one card up or one card down from your draw pile, it’s that easy!
❤️Stay on par by removing the most cards in each hand.
❤️Fun (and funny) golf-themed game of solitaire! You'll play on the Fairway, but don't expect to improve your golf swing!
❤️Let Fairway take you away to the peace and serenity of a golf course and far away destinations with beautifully hand painted scenery.
❤️Use the News to easily navigate through fun events, daily rewards, and 3 game modes.
❤️The Fairway commentators will cheer you through your game with puns and wise cracks that’ll have you chuckling through each puzzle challenge.

Solitaire Card Game with a Twist!
♠️ Enjoy a fun events every day!
♠️ Your "golf bag" holds clubs that represent playable numbered cards.
♠️ Wild Cards are represented as gold Midas Club™
♠️ Use power-up cards like the shuffle, preview, and mulligan (undo move) to clear boards.
♠️ Expertly play through puzzling challenges; rough hazards, sand traps, and rain hazards
♠️ So many ways to get rewards! Stamp collections, Trophies, Tours, mini-games, events, playing streaks of cards, and daily gifts!
♠️ With a little patience you can develop the skills to play like a pro!

Love solitaire but want more? We’ve got it:
♦️ Over 1,000 courses and counting!
♦️ 3 game modes: Main, Daily, and Bonus.
♦️ Play as long as you like; no lives to limit your game play!
♦️ Thoughtfully designed for easy game play - NO squinting!
♦️ Daily Course mode features special themes, challenges, and rewards.
♦️ Stamps collections are hand drawn and reward you when you collect a set of four.
♦️ Enjoy fun mini-games like McDinko, Wild Shot, Long Drive Contest, and Gopher Derby.
♦️ Special Golf Bag holds your wild cards in the form of Midas Clubs and card replacements in the form of numbered Clubs.
♦️ The Great Shot meter tells you how many cards to play in a streak to get bonus cards and rewards!
♦️ Power Up your strategy for your next move! Use Preview to see your next 5 playable cards and Shuffle to mix up the cards on your board!
♦️ The Eraser allows you to replay a course hole to improve your course score!
Caution! Fairway Solitaire is a highly addictive card game!

Don’t get left in the rough, follow us on Facebook for more Fairway Solitaire news, fun, and games: http://www.facebook.com/FairwaySolitaire

Experiencing issues? Please visit https://fairwaysolitaire.zendesk.com

*By downloading this game you are agreeing to our privacy policy: http://www.bigfishgames.com/company/privacy.html; and our terms of use: http://www.bigfishgames.com/company/terms.html

comments: I loved the game when I played the beta. Turn based rpg with different parables within the story mode. Unique unit designs. I cant get very far with the game because the audio echoes itself to the point where its almost hard to understand what is happening. Its a good thing there is subtitles. The game prides itself on its audio aspect by recommending "use earphones for best experience" before starting, and I would really love to hear the game.

I used to love this game hence  I moved to the English server... having played on the Chinese server, I noticed the drop rate for this server is super low. Also the packages in the game ate way overpriced. Some skins in the Chinese server are free (ie moonlight blossom yuki onna) whereas in NA server you have to pay to get it. Honestly if the playing field is equal between the NA and the Asia server were equal, I'll stay in the NA server. Right now I'm going to move back to the Asia server even tho I can barely read the story.

I love absolutely everything about this game. Its perfect...accept for one very big detail. Sadly, the characters that have unique and strategic skills are amazingly fun but will never amount to anything in pvp. The good characters are all too easy to play with and it becomes dull due to the lack of thought it takes to win. PVP is a disaster in gameplay and matchmaking. Otherwise, this game is very good.

It's a beautifully made game with a good story line involved. Sure it can be pay to win and all that, but nothing that a bit of hard work can't catch up to.  The controls are easy enough to understand and the combat system is just as simple. It does offer a few unique things such as the shared resource for bigger and better attacks, but it only adds to the depth of the combat system. All in all it's a good game and well thought out.

i really liked the game it has everything to be best game. But dont be soo greedy. please make some more events and make some balance in duel or whatever because of course i cant win against someone like 45lvl when I'm 30 no? And the summoning rate is low mystery amulets are only one for a week lol i think it will take 10 years to get ssr for me. I dont want to leave this game please make something thanks you.

It's a fantastic game. It would be nice to lock actions so when you're on auto you don't waste orbs. You can pay alot to get more summons but it's all about grinding out the materials and taking the time to level up the guys you want. Would recommend for anyone who loves a good farm/grind game.

comments: This game is really fun and addicting. However, the omission of "not nice" words including "sex", "damn" and many other legitimate words makes it hard to take its learning value seriously. The word "sex" is on driver's licenses, passports, and all forms of legal ID. Oh, and the word "queer" is not recognized. Why? If the game could at least recognize words accurately, I'd give it 5 stars in a heartbeat.

I just received an update yesterday  (2/1/2018) and now where you can watch videos to get coins, the videos are not playing.  It just goes to a black screen or boots you out all together. Please fix it,  for this is a great game, thank you

Somewhat 'addictive'. I do enjoy this game, BUT, like other "make words" games, even if you have a large vocabulary, some words are too obscure, like "burin", "carer", "cine", "doyen", "olds", "prig", "weal", and "weir" (I have a list of 52 such words from the game). Can be frustrating when you have found a word that falls between two other words, only to have it be an "extra" word instead of THE word in the list. Really irksome when I spend tons of time on one last word, only to find it was one of the words in my obscure words list AGAIN. Maybe those really obscure words should be "extra" words.  At least you can get $ credit for those extra words. The Daily Wheel spin is nice, but when you press STOP, a random speed up or slow down occurs, so the predictable-ness that the wheel would seem to offer is useless. Old treasure chests were better.

Awesome game!  I can't put it down. There's just one problem. Last night I had almost 500 points, but had to go to sleep; so I quit. This morning I had to start from scratch.  I've played this game before from my old phone & could always start where I left off, but playing it from this new phone, where I had to download it anew, I can't do that. Every time it's the same thing. HELP!!!

comments: At first I thought it was great, but now I realise it's just another PAY-TO-WIN game... You've got no chance if you come up against a paid-for character like Batman. It's such a shame this is the way game devs are heading these days.

*Update Very greedy company-> bad rating from me! They sell packages for 200-300 dollars! What's worse is that there are people who are stupid enough to pay for it. Aside from that a very cool game. To be at the very top it is pay to win. Besides that really cool. Lots of heroes and therefore possibilities.

It's a great game don't get me wrong but as I wrote in previous reviews they just went completely pay-to-win. Nowadays you cannot win not only because you don't have the latest gacha heroes, you just can't win because they released Batman for $160 to be competitive, most broken character ever. They are also releasing legendary pets... For $400 each. So yes, forget about having a fun competition, some players are simply out of you range by how much money they have spent and that ruins the experience.

My first review disappeared so I will leave another.  This game was great at first, then it started inserting the buyable characters such as Batman, Assassin's Creed and they are so over powered, one of them can take down your whole team without taking any damage.  Game is now so unbalanced that it isn't worth playing.  Until they fix the game, it worth playing.  Unless you like wasting money to feel like a god with over powered characters.  Game is dead, play something else.

definitely one of the best game if not the best game ived ever played on mobile. when you pull a hero for free the feeling is incomparable. the strategy you need to bring down other tougher players/guilds, its all here i tell ya! and to cap it all off the customer service is GREAT. you have concerns they reply ASAP what more could one ask for?!  install now! =)

Had the potential to be good but they care more about money than a good game, once you progress so far you will constantly lose to ppl who have bought characters that are vastly over powered. They will auto reply and say plenty of ppl still have fun without out paying, I made it to level 65 and it's just not true.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to a world of Holy Paladins, Deadly Dragons, Evil Wizards and over 50 other playable heroes! Conquer kingdoms lost to a mysterious curse, and find a new adventure around every corner. Create and lead your party of legendary Heroes into battle!
Join the 80 million players already experiencing this unique Action-Strategic RPG!

In partnership with Ubisoft, Lilith Games is proud to announce that the Prince from PRINCE OF PERSIA joins Ezio from ASSASSIN'S CREED as a playable hero in Soul Hunters.
 
［LEAD YOUR OWN EPIC PARTY］
- Choose from over 50 Heroes, from Stone Collossus to Ice Dragon, Sun Goddess to Wolf Child.
- Strategically build your party with Tanks, DPS and Support Heroes. Form Your Own MOBA Party!
- Collect Soulstones scattered throughout the world to upgrade your Heroes into an unstoppable force.
 
［MASTER THE TACTICS, PERFECT YOUR STRATEGY］

Create the perfectly balanced party to overcome the most powerful foes and legions.
Master your Heroes’ abilities to protect your allies, interrupt your opponents’ attacks, or deal massive damage.
 
 
［LEGENDARY  BATTLES］
 
-Challenge players from all over the world and become Master of the Arena.
-Advance to the Epic Arena and earn the title of Elite Soul Hunter.
-Create or Join a Guild,participate in raids, and earn exclusive rewards! Clash with other Guilds in the weekly Guild Wars! 


［A UNIQUE IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE ］
-A dark curse has been cast upon the kingdoms and it’s up to YOU to Unite the Heroes and Break the Curse!
-Real-time combat with captivating visual effects and extremely deep strategic gameplay.
-Explore mysterious and magical lands to find and collect new Heroes in a captivating campaign.

FOLLOW US at:
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/soulhuntersmobilegame
Twitter @HuntersGlobal
Homepage: http://www.soulhuntersgame.com
Instagram #soulhunters
SUPPORT
If you encounter any difficulties or require support please contact Customer Service by tapping on your in-game Avatar and then Support.

comments: I don't like having to rely friends or being made to buy something in order to unlock levels to continue to play. My friends don't play the same games I do so I can't get keys from them. The only option is again BUYING the keys to unlock the level to move on. It's enough to purchase coins to buy power-ups but I refuse to buy to play the game when it is supposed to be free. I'd rather pay up front for the game than that. Deleted!
A very fun and addicting game. I cannot stop playing it.
I love the animation and the caracters, it's adictive!
Just a funny, silly game.
Its so cool & i love how the cats sing 2 u. My fave is Berry the blue cat & his music & Smokey the red  cat
I really like this game and all the different levels I wish there was no ads but I should buy the no ad deal for $0.99

comments: I'm not a fan of mobile gaming, but this game is truly something else. I love The Walking Dead, so I gave this a shot, however, after playing Road to Survival (or whatever it's called- it's the TWD game based off of the comics), my expectations were pretty low. This game though, is not Road to Survival; it's so much more. This is how you do a free to play game with microtransactions right. You can buy a lot in this game with money, but you can easily obtain everything on your own, and quite frankly, it's more fun to do that anyways. This game is super addicting and gives me something fun to do when I've got a few minutes. I've been playing it for months, and I don't plan on stopping anytime soon.

Just a suggestion, it'll be SO MUCH MORE AWESOME probably 10 stars for TWD fans if you could do better missions or events that allow us to get better opportunities to farm for TWD character tokens or class tokens, and also more chance for farming or creating weapons instead of the current set up now. Don't quite like the fact that when deals are awesome but they cost a ton! Try lessen the value a little bit and im sure some players dont mind spending (just my opinion). But overall review, its awesome for TWD fans out there!

It's got good action in graphic. Been playing for a 2 years in 10 month's now.Stay human and Survive.  Up dates all the time love it keep them coming Robert Cregman. Thanks for making the Walking  dead show And game. New stuff to do all the time. In wow all these new survivers. There are some loading issues action issues movement issues alot more mission.

Originally gave you 4 stars, but its one of only a couple of mobile games I have never deleted since installing. Constant content coming in, great use of TWD licence! Keep up the great work- seriously from someone who hates most mobile games!
I've been playing for over 2 years. A few more new maps would be nice and stop nerfing our great traits like interrupt and wrestler! Other than that, great game and great community.
Really good strategy game. The thing that lost it the 5th star is that when I started a second game on another device, it won't play ads for free stuff

Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!The Walking Dead: No Man‚Äôs Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you‚Äôll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl‚Äôs crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham‚Äôs assault rifle. ‚Ä¢ FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat‚Ä¢ COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC‚Äôs The Walking Dead‚Ä¢ CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission‚Ä¢ HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC‚Äôs The Walking Dead ‚Ä¢ JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards‚ÄúThrow in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.‚Äù - Pocketgamer‚ÄúEach aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.‚Äù - Mashable‚ÄúImagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC‚Äôs The Walking Dead. That‚Äôs No Man‚Äôs Land in a nutshell.‚Äù - GamezeboFor more, please visit:http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomanslandhttp://twitter.com/twdnomanslandhttp://www.thewalkingdeadnomansland.comhttp://www.youtube.com/nxtgmsFor player support, please visit:nextgames.helpshift.com
descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers!

Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!

The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle.

• FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat
• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission
• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards

“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer

“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable

“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - Gamezebo

For more, please visit:

http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomansland
http://twitter.com/twdnomansland
http://www.thewalkingdeadnomansland.com
http://www.youtube.com/nxtgms

For player support, please visit:
nextgames.helpshift.com

title: The Walking Dead No Man's Land

comments: I am only giving ABF a 3 right now. I have played ABF since the beginning of it's time. I feel as if the coin rewards are very slim in the higher leagues. I am a Diamond Star 4 and I feel as if the higher the level the higher the reward but, the rewards are all the same. When you work your way up you want to feel rewarded! If coin rewards increase in the higher levels so will my rating!!!!!

I would give it 5 stars, but they've changed a few things. It's now more difficult to earn coins for power-ups. So in order to win the tournaments, they've put people in the position of having to make purchases more often. Needless to say, I don't play as often anymore. I've also noticed that several of my friends don't play anymore either. Too bad, the game used to be a lot more fun.

Been playing this game for years. Loved it in the beginning.  Seems the lower I rate the game as they try to make easier for people that are not good.  the birds I throw are nearly useless a lot of times compared to playing the same game for a star 2 player I know. And now the game is crashing constantly. Wish I could sell the nearly 100,000 bird coins I have. Seems I won't need them.

Ok so when there is an issue that needs addressed, sometimes it take a couple of days for the tech people to get to it. But overall the game is awesome! This is the only game that I still play every day from the time I got a smart phone, which has been several years!

I love playing angry birds friends. I'm an adult woman and have played since they came out with the game. Scoring in first place many times. Recently there seems to be too much graphics and sometimes using plays from other games or other angry birds games. If people are submitting what they have thought out, please make sure it stays within original angry birds friends game. Some levels are too far out there.

I loved this game to keep in touch with a few friends but please take those stupid Dignity ads off... They do not close and always end up missing up my game. I have to close the game out and start all over. Loosing many power ups and coins in this tedius game making it more frustrating than fun.

But i insist AGAƒ∞N that SYSTEM Dƒ∞Vƒ∞Sƒ∞ON needs a new update or review. PUT AT LEAST A TEAM THAT SHOULD GET RELEGATED TO A LOWER Dƒ∞Vƒ∞Sƒ∞ON.  The idea that you have to change the whole team every season is also not a good thing. Some little changes are needed to make this game a wonderful game.

I think 6% is not enough specially when we have 2 games per day (league and cup or champions league), because after the game, they still have to have two training sessions and they get too tired, with no time to recover at least 50 of condition for the next match, so from ther we have no manage well by leadind "easy sesseions" and player do not develop as they should. For me the time of recovery is fine, but the points conceived are to low... at least 10% in each 3hrs. Hope you get my point. The app is üëå I love it

Worst game ever every update just gives more problems and the current problems we message these idiots about are never resolved...infact they don't even reply.. they are only about the money now.. ive gave 6 years to these losers and this is how I am repaid.. disgusting is an understatement.. avoid games made by these rude ignoramuses at all costs
I think u guys should find a way for us(we the managers) to get tokens easier . I don't understand why winning the league or champions league only gets you money but no tokens . it really sucks
description: Join over 170 million players worldwide to become the best soccer manager with the unbeatable excitement of Top Eleven! Build your club from scratch and control every aspect of your team - Create your own strategies and formations and take on Mourinho, your friends and millions of other Top Eleven managers on a daily basis. Top Eleven is the most-played online soccer manager game! Begin your journey as a soccer manager today! Name your club and build it from the ground up. In Top Eleven you have the opportunity to control every aspect of your club, from training sessions, transfers, squad selection, formation set-ups, club finances and kit designs. In this free multi-player game you can join forces and compete against friends or test and improve your skills while playing against other managers from around the globe. Choose official jerseys and emblems from the Premier League, Bundesliga, MLS, the legendary Champions League and many more soccer leagues.There are players that have managed their clubs for over 7 years and have won successive League, Cup and Champions League titles! comments: Very similar to the dark souls style obviously, I'm frikkin loving it, lovely survival style, it's not hard to survive and it has a great, easy functioning gameplay, only flaw is that it doesn't have a female version of the character...big flaw
Great game, maybe just add a small tutorial please.
Yes
all about money to success!

Very addictive. I'm a big fan of both your games <3! Awesome graphics, awesome set up, everything g is awesome! I can say some resources are hard to get tho esp a well. But other then that its pretty cool! I've just started so I've notgonna do a whole lot yet. Went to a yellow area once but man so not ready for that.. Also seems like I can't never keep stuff to heal me or even find it? Keep up the good work!!

Solid game, definitely becoming one of my favorites. Only thing I have an issue with, when we die, respawn us back in the zone we died at, for a chance at claiming our body. Also, a friend system outside of a guild would be great. Chat and trade would make encounters with other players more entertaining. Last thing, classes would complete the game. And don't just do three classes if implemented, do 5 or so. But A+ to the devs for a wonderful game!
description: Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!‚óè EXPLORE NEW LANDSExplore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors‚Äô castles to obtain the most valuable resources.‚óè LEARN CRAFTINGBuild workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands‚Äô most dangerous inhabitants.‚óè IMPROVE YOUR CASTLEBuild a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don‚Äôt forget to explore your enemies‚Äô territory to collect valuable loot.‚óè DEFEAT ENEMIESMorning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!‚óè SADDLE YOUR HORSEBuild a stable and don‚Äôt miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. descriptionHTML:
Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!

● EXPLORE NEW LANDS

Explore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.

● LEARN CRAFTING

Build workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.

● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLE

Build a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.

● DEFEAT ENEMIES

Morning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!

● SADDLE YOUR HORSE

Build a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.

● OVERCOME HARDSHIP

Life in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.

● BEFRIEND THE RAVENS

Build a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.

● JOIN A CLAN

A clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.

● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHT

When night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.

● RECEIVE REWARDS

You may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.

● SOLVE THE MYSTERY

Search for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.


Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!

Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.

summary: Survive as long as you can. Craft your weapons and battle against cursed souls.
title: Grim Soul: Dark Fantasy Survival

comments: An absolutely wonderful game. Even better then Hearthstone if you ask me. It's so good that even I, Solaire of Astora who hails from Dark Souls, absolutely praises this game. 100% recommend. This only issue that one could run into is lag, but this is only due to the fact that I have an older phone. I'm sure that if you have a better phone, this game would be EVEN better. Praise the Sun \[T]/

Elder scrolls legends is a game with a elder scrolls taste and mechanics. Its choices, game modes and progress systems works perfect. It's story is great, and serve as a tutorial for the big part of the game. You can even unlock new dlc and decks through your progress in the game. This is truly a marvelous game. Problems like connection break occurs very rare and does not affect the game. If you like CCG and ELDER SCROLLS, then this game is highly recommended.

I'm a huge card player of all kinds and really didn't expect much of this game, but have loved all of the console ELDER SCROLLS so I gave it a try. Immediately hooked, and the best part is how well balanced the game is in terms of card power. I have made 4 decks of separate play styles with equal win rates. 5 stars for sure

Hands down one of the best card games I have ever played. The gameplay is simplistic yet emersive. The different combinations of cards and deck types you can build is vast allowing you to adapt to any challenge you may encounter. While the gameplay is phenomenal, it's very easy to gain an understanding of how to play and the cards themselves. Bethesda has yet again made a game that has captivated me. Well done üëç

The first three turns of the game has an incredibly small amount of finite moves.  You wouldn't know this because the typical player will take more than 30 seconds on their first, second, and third turns.  You start to realize that on "draft" games, you will benefit more if you concede the game when your opponent is taking an agonisingly long time on the first few turns because they're putting so much thought into the only play in their hand.

Week 1: *Going to try to make this an ongoing review*. Had to lower this to 4 stars overall, because you have to either pay or grind to access all of story mode. I'm gonna buy it, but I think it shouldn't cost more than $14.99. Just mho. PvP is fun and you actually play LIVE people, not an AI running someone's cards. Level rewards seem generous and worthwhile.  Runs a bit slow, but I know it's my phone and not the app's fault. Gameplay is very fluid and makes sense. I already like it FAR BETTER than Hearthstone.

descriptionHTML:
The Elder Scrolls®: Legends™ - Heroes of Skyrim

"The first real challenge to the CCG throne." - Shacknews

Built for skill, not chance, The Elder Scrolls®: Legends™ - Heroes of Skyrim is a strategy card game based on the world and lore of the award-winning Elder Scrolls series.

Enter the world of Skyrim, full of formidable dragons and fan-favorite characters and heroes. Play for hours or minutes across many card battle game modes that are easy to learn but challenging to master. Battle against opponents in challenging card games, and examine the arena to come up with a strategy that will end in your victory.

Enjoy card collecting combined with intense multiplayer PVP card games. Collect cards and level up your existing deck heroes to take on even more challenging opponents. Can you survive the world of Skyrim?

The Elder Scrolls®: Legends™ - Heroes of Skyrim Features:

PLAY RPG CARD GAMES ON YOUR OWN
- Strategy card games – Learn the best strategy for winning card battles in Story Mode.
- Earn legendary heroes, Legends cards, decks, and packs when you play solo.
- Draft battle decks from scratch and battle a series of computer opponents.

ONLINE PVP AGAINST OTHER PLAYERS
- Multiplayer games let you test your deck strength against friends.
- Online PVP games – Challenge online opponents in ranked play.
- Draft battle decks from scratch and battle other players who have done the same.

PICK YOUR CARD BATTLES
- Expand strategy options with Legends gameplay, which features a divided battlefield with “lanes.”
- Card strategy – Carefully place your cards in either lane to attack your opponent and their cards.
- Strategy is key – Make sure you’re prepared for whatever your opponent plays next.

LEVEL UP BATTLE CARDS
- Crafted battle – Collect cards and tailor your deck to your play style.
- Deck heroes and other cards can be upgraded by winning games against decks that contain the same card.
- Level up battle cards to improve your decks and give yourself more flexibility.

MONTHLY CCG UPDATES
- Why play a strategy card game if It doesn’t change? Add a new card to your deck every month.
- Trading card game constant updates to keep the meta-game fresh and interesting keeps the game fresh and competitive.

Explore the world of Skyrim and battle challenging opponents in intense card games. Discover the best card game strategy, and add legendary heroes and fan-favorite characters to your battle decks in The Elder Scrolls®: Legends™ - Heroes of Skyrim.

Download now and play multiplayer card games.
developerAddress:
Bethesda Softworks LLC
1370 Piccard Drive, Suite 120
Rockville, MD 28050
recentChanges: Deckbuilder
Previously, the number of decks you could have at one time in the Deckbuilder was limited to 35. That has been expanded to 50 decks.
Bug Fixes
‚Ä¢	Balmora Spymaster no longer gives negative stats and costs to some cards (such as Ancient Giant).
‚Ä¢	Embassy Disguise no longer gives Cover to a Guard.
‚Ä¢	Time is Running Out! has improved wording in non-English languages.
‚Ä¢	The ongoing Skeleton buff from Bone Colossus is now properly removed when the Colossus leaves play.
summary: RPG card game where the heroes of Skyrim battle it out in a strategy card game.
title: The Elder Scrolls: Legends

descriptionHTML:
If you love Hidden Object Games, epic adventure, and romance stories, Pearl's Peril will be your new favorite!

Find objects, solve the mystery and discover a new world full of twists. This game offers graphically beautiful scenes where you will have to reveal secrets and intrigues.

Pearl’s Peril is a stunning hidden object game that sweeps you away into an age of intrigue and romance, where polite appearances give way to inner greed and familial bonds are broken by betrayal.

Make friends, fall in love and seek clues in hundreds of hidden object scenes.

*YOU WILL LOVE PEARL’S PERIL*

● EXPERIENCE THE BEAUTY
No other hidden object adventure game can match Pearl’s stunning, hand-drawn scenes. Hundreds of unique locations transport you to a historic era when adventure pilots like Pearl were just beginning to open up our world.

● DISCOVER NEW ROMANCE SCENES
An epic story-driven game you’ll experience over years of gameplay! It will leave you with many dramatic scenes and stories to cherish and experience over and over again.

● UNRAVEL THE MYSTERY
Have fun! Find romance! Fall in love! Get swept away! Be shocked! But beware… in a world where power goes unchecked and hidden ambition knows no bounds, nothing is ever as it seems.

● BUILD YOUR PARADISE
As you journey through Pearl’s exciting challenges and hidden object gameplay, always return to Artemis Island to rebuild and expand – to create a paradise that you will love.

Join more than 40 million others when you play the most beautiful, deepest, highest-quality an epic hidden object adventure game on your mobile device. Adventure is waiting for you, so get started today!

~

Pearl Wallace lives the exciting life of an heiress and socialite in the 1920’s in New York City. That is until her father’s sudden suicide plunges her into a world of intrigue and mystery. Despite overwhelming evidence to the contrary, Pearl knows in her heart that her father’s death was no suicide. She will stop at nothing as she seeks to unravel the series of events leading to his untimely death and find the hidden villains who were really responsible. Money, danger and even death is no object as Pearl works to clear Samuel Wallace’s name.

As an ace pilot and cunning detective, Pearl flies headfirst into a whirlwind of adventure which takes her around the world from the depths of Africa to the heights of the Eiffel Tower. However, she’ll need your keen eye if she’s going to find the evidence she needs to confirm her suspicions that her father didn’t commit suicide at all. He was murdered!

Travel with Pearl to her family home on the Polynesian island of Artemis and help her find clues as well as piece together the puzzles, revealing the truth about mysterious secret orders locked in a struggle to determine the rise and fall of nations. Join our heroine as she unveils the hidden story of deception and betrayal that involves nearly everyone she has ever known or loved. Stand beside her as she seeks and finds hidden strength. Along the journey find the wealth to rebuild Artemis Island to its former glory, while discovering loyal friends, love and ferocious enemies that will test your limits.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Having problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us here: http://woo.ga/PPhelp

Become a fan of the game by keeping up with the latest stories, rewards, and competitions here:

http://www.facebook.com/pearlsperil
Visit us at http://wooga.com
Like us on facebook.com/wooga

Pearl’s Peril is free to download and play but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

You may require an Internet connection to play Pearl’s Peril and access its social features. Pearl’s Peril may also contain advertising.

And have endless fun playing one of the best infinite runners out there! Whether you‚Äôre a kid, or just young at heart, this cool game will have you running, jumping, and getting an EPIC ADRENALINE RUSH IN NO TIME AT ALL! ‚òÖ Get a rush as you run through the subway tunnel to the new side world, Medieval Town. ‚òÖ Race down the slopes and ride the halfpipe on your new snowboard ‚Äì it‚Äôs super cool!!!‚òÖ Meet special guest star, Princess Angela, and spend the winter with your favorite characters, Talking Tom, Talking Angela, Talking Hank, Talking Ben, and Talking Ginger!GET READY, GET SET, RUN!! Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/Customer support: support@outfit7.com
descriptionHTML:
Run to chase after the robber and explore the endless running worlds of Talking Tom Gold Run!
Race to catch the fun with loads of FREE CHARACTERS and the SPECIAL NEW CHARACTER, PRINCESS ANGELA! She lives in a magical place called MEDIEVAL TOWN. So, get ready to go for the gold in this exciting SIDE WORLD.

Or test your snowboarding skills in the Snowboard Side World! Race snowboards on the snow! Rule the slopes! And have endless fun playing one of the best infinite runners out there!

Whether you’re a kid, or just young at heart, this cool game will have you running, jumping, and getting an EPIC ADRENALINE RUSH IN NO TIME AT ALL!

★ Get a rush as you run through the subway tunnel to the new side world, Medieval Town.
★ Race down the slopes and ride the halfpipe on your new snowboard – it’s super cool!!!
★ Meet special guest star, Princess Angela, and spend the winter with your favorite characters, Talking Tom, Talking Angela, Talking Hank, Talking Ben, and Talking Ginger!

GET READY, GET SET, RUN!! Come and have fun for free with this amazing endless runner! Chase after the robber who stole your gold and unlock new worlds. Do you have what it takes to run through all the worlds and win? It’s not super easy to be the best, but we believe in you! Start running and racing now. It’s time to go for gold!

Run to chase the robber – he’s got your gold! Use the gold bars you get back to build and upgrade amazing homes for Talking Tom and Friends! The finished homes will then unlock new worlds just for you! So, what are you waiting for? Let’s run for fun this winter!

★★★ENJOY THE FUN OF TALKING TOM GOLD RUN★★★
ENDLESS FUN: With endless running, racing, and snowboarding, the fun never ends!!!
MISSIONS AND REWARDS: Win missions to get cool rewards!
BUILD AMAZING HOMES: Use the gold bars you collect to build homes for Talking Tom and Friends!
UNLOCK NEW RUNNING WORLDS: Explore even more fun worlds when you upgrade your home!
RUN WITH SPECIAL CHARACTERS: Run even faster and do cool tricks with the help of special characters!

PLAY FOR FREE!

This app contains:
The possibility to use and connect with friends via social networks;
The option to make in-app purchases;
Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money (build progress, in-game functionalities, etc.);
Promotions for Outfit7’s products, as well as advertising;
Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player’s progress;
Videos to watch starring Outfit7’s animated characters via YouTube integration; and
Links that direct customers to Outfit7’s websites and other apps.

This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates that Outfit7 has established COPPA-compliant privacy practices to protect the personal information of children. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/
Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/
Customer support: support@outfit7.com

comments: I'm honestly about to uninstall. I've been playing 3 days and it's making it impossible to complete the daily task. I can't even invite friends... Edit: it won't allow me to invite friends, I'm able to play one game a day unless I continuously buy more tokens...but with ads after every game, they get funding from them. I installed this game because the reviews were the best, but maybe it's just got a grudge against me!

I understand they are trying to make money off this app, but if you are going to charge someone 320 tickets to play 4 cards, the reward should be more than 70 tickets per win.  I mean, really?! Some people want to play bingo, but want something to work toward without being bored.  I played Bingo story and deleted it, because I had a lot of credits, but EVERY BOARD WAS THE SAME.  Also, the powerups in this game should be limited to what you have available, and not have to purchase because you are out of said power up.  It might make more people play if they are rewarded.  .  I mean the quests saying you will win 600 tickets if you complete the quest, but you're spending on the normal side 280+ tickets, really?  And no other options besides watching ad videos for free credits?  And I'm not saying to add a "download this app and run it for 3 tickets.  Reach level 300 for 40 tickets."  Rant over

Everything would be pretty neat, but there should be another way to get more tickets. I've been stuck at the New York state for several days now, cause I can only replay the first stages with the tickets from the daily bonus.
Love it. The only reason I didn't give 5's across the board is it gets costly per game as you gain levels. The games are way fun and you can play up to 8 cards !!!!!

There should be more ways to get or win more tickets and power-ups. I also think the costs per cards increases too much from board to board. Other than those two issues, I love this game. Would play more if there were other ways to get/win tickets, the purchase costs is ridiculous for the middle/working-class.  I'd rather pay my bills than buy fake in-game tickets that CAN'T win me REAL CASH. Thank you keep up the good work.
It's a fun game. You have to be quick near the end beacause the game seem to end while the caller is still calling the last number. You don't get a penalty for daubing the wrong number.

Arcane Legends is the best fantasy action RPG and MMORPG game on mobile, perfect for both tablets and phones! Adventure through dungeons in this MMO and fight bosses, find loot, join guilds and collect pets. Explore a breathtaking 3D world with friends in this massive award-winning game from Spacetime Studios. Construct the ultimate deck with an amazing horde of Heroes and magical Creatures to save a threatened kingdom. With hundreds of cards to collect, every deck is unique. Feast your eyes on spectacular HD graphics, get lost inside thrilling battles, and delve into majestic and mysterious lore!

Gear should drop pre built and not in bits that have to be combined once you gather enough of them. Devs responded and significantly improved the translations in a few places.

descriptionHTML:
Let’s take an adventure in the Star!
Online Multiplayer RPG Strategy Combat Game

1.Travel with massive goddesses
2.Various fashions to choose
3.Achieve victory with your wisdom
4.Establish guild with your friends
5.Novetly experience of VR/AR

Features of Star Goddesses:
[Summon Heroes to Strengthen the Fleet]
Summon Types: Basic Summon, Diamond Summon and 10 Continuous Summon. Summon means opportunity to have stronger teammates. With 10 Continuous Summon, there must be at least one above legendary.

[Interstellar Adventure and Other Raids at Your Choice]
Along the way, 10 raids such as the Arena, Ornament Snatch, Star Secret, Space Convoy, Star Treasure, Hunter Congress and Master league are awaiting you.

[Crazy Cross-server Team PK]
Win the decisive battle in the ice field with your Goddess Legion and dominate the whole server.

[Super Cool Real 3D Battle]
Super cool 3D battlefield with 1m panoramic particles under your full control.

[Interstellar Boss Battle]
Challenge the King of Flame - Ragnaros, then get the Energy Crystal which is indispensable for improving your teammates’ skills and Devil Medal. Time is limited, so go with your teammates to defeat the Devil!

[All-weather Interstellar Boss Battle]
1m panoramic particles with 3D; super cool battlefield under your full control.

comments: Really entertaining story. Great tactics gameplay and characters. I enjoyed this much more than I expected. Steve Jobs said, good artists borrow but great artists steal and I feel that that is what this game did. Very heavy Naruto vibe with Logi and Dias. Then of course,  the Full Metal Alchemist feel with alchemy and the door of truth and leaving part of your body on the other side of the door in order to gain power. 7 kingdoms, 7 deadly sins. This had a good animated opening and song. This game has been very entertaining and I'm looking forward to the next episode to see what happens next. Good stuff, Gumi.

Quite unique game with active players who already experienced the japanese version. UI needs lots of improvements, my goodness! Like Units page must have a back button, and be available not only when going back from Home (Talk abt inconvenience). Loot pieces on-hand should be available when newly acquired loots are pressed and hold! Screen transition also needs optimization for faster reaction.

So far I have only been playing the game for a few hrs. The graphics are sharp and the controls are easy to learn. My only complaint is you can't turn the camera a complete 360 to get a better look at where you opponents are. Other than that it's a great game. Closest thing to Final Fantasy Tactics on Android. Love it.

Best Turn based tactic game. You dont need to be a whale to be good bcos of10% "rainbow" summon chance. The stage and event is quite challenging. The only problem is MULTIPLAY. Please make the player can switch between private (code) room to public so that if we only wait for 1 friend, we can switch to public to fill the other 2 slots. It is because if we go to public there is a high chance our friend cannot enter our room bcos of full slots. And then force us to disband and recreate room over and over just to make our friend enter our room.

Game is SUPERB, however it will be awesome if devs could implement following suggestion 1. Quest mission pop up is super annoying if we want to manually farm the equipment in the story mission. 2. Try again mission should be automatically enter the dungeon instead of choosing the team formation. 3. Auto go option, so player can easily farm the dungeon.

Great VAs and story. What I mostly disliked is how slow the combat is even with the accelerated mode, to grind materials it can be quite annoying if you lack skip tickets. I hope they add an option to skip combat animation soon.
description: The pinnacle of Japanese Mobile Strategy RPGs enjoyed by millions in Japan, THE ALCHEMIST CODE brings forth an enjoyable mix of genuine tactical elements and a plethora of high quality content - from intense 3D animations to stunning anime-styled cutscenes as well as superb music and voice acting!Play your cards right - master the arcane power of Alchemy and alter the fate of the world!FULL-FLEDGED STRATEGY RPG* Classic turn-based battle system with grid-based movement* Command strategic units on 3D terrains, consider the difference in elevation and orientation to turn the tides of battles DEEP CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION * Summon, collect and evolve more than 50 beautifully designed characters* Master a wide selection of Jobs Classes, unlock new abilities and outfits  PLAY WITH AND AGAINST FRIENDS * Real-time 4P multiplayer co-op - Challenge high-level dungeons with 3 other players* Put your skills to the test at the Arena! Battle fellow players to climb Daily Arena Rankings and get rewarded RICH EXPANSIVE CONTENT * Go on invigorating adventures and traverse through unique landscapes * Take up exciting Missions and Challenges daily and get fantastic rewards * Discover intriguing character personalities, gripping backstories and quests -------------------------STORY INTRODUCTIONThe Forbidden Art of Alchemy brought about destruction and a world divided by differing ideals.It was sealed away into the darkness by the Seven Kingdoms of Babel...However, its seal has shown signs of weakening, signalling an eminent foreshadowing of what's to come..Bestowed with the power of Alchemy, who will prevail, and bring about a change in the world? Where will your will take you and how will the world judge you? - Mankind‚Äôs Will is merely at the mercy of the Stones of Gods -NOTICE: THE ALCHEMIST CODE is completely free to play. However, some in-game items can also be bought with real money. WEBSITEhttp://alchemistcode.com/FORUMhttp://forums.gumi.sg/thealchemistcode SOCIAL NETWORKFacebook: facebook.com/thealchemistcodeInstagram: instagram.com/alchemist_codeTwitter: twitter/alchemist_codeTERMS OF SERVICE & PRIVACY POLICYhttp://gumi.sg/terms/IMPORTANT NOTICE** THE ALCHEMIST CODE requires a device with Android 4.1 and above.** A device with a minimum of 1GB RAM is recommended. Performance is not guaranteed on devices with less than 1GB RAM.** 1.8 GB free space in phone internal memory is recommended to install the game with all of the downloadable contents.** The game will require you to grant permission to access photos, media, and other files on your device. Enabling this permission will allow game data to be written to your SD card.** Contact us on https://alchemistww.zendesk.com/ for further help with technical issues.
descriptionHTML:
The pinnacle of Japanese Mobile Strategy RPGs enjoyed by millions in Japan, THE ALCHEMIST CODE brings forth an enjoyable mix of genuine tactical elements and a plethora of high quality content - from intense 3D animations to stunning anime-styled cutscenes as well as superb music and voice acting!

Play your cards right - master the arcane power of Alchemy and alter the fate of the world!

FULL-FLEDGED STRATEGY RPG
* Classic turn-based battle system with grid-based movement
* Command strategic units on 3D terrains, consider the difference in elevation and orientation to turn the tides of battles

DEEP CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION
* Summon, collect and evolve more than 50 beautifully designed characters
* Master a wide selection of Jobs Classes, unlock new abilities and outfits

PLAY WITH AND AGAINST FRIENDS
* Real-time 4P multiplayer co-op - Challenge high-level dungeons with 3 other players
* Put your skills to the test at the Arena! Battle fellow players to climb Daily Arena Rankings and get rewarded

RICH EXPANSIVE CONTENT
* Go on invigorating adventures and traverse through unique landscapes
* Take up exciting Missions and Challenges daily and get fantastic rewards
* Discover intriguing character personalities, gripping backstories and quests

-------------------------

STORY INTRODUCTION

The Forbidden Art of Alchemy brought about destruction and a world divided by differing ideals.

It was sealed away into the darkness by the Seven Kingdoms of Babel...

However, its seal has shown signs of weakening, signalling an eminent foreshadowing of what's to come..

Bestowed with the power of Alchemy, who will prevail, and bring about a change in the world? Where will your will take you and how will the world judge you?

- Mankind’s Will is merely at the mercy of the Stones of Gods -


NOTICE: THE ALCHEMIST CODE is completely free to play. However, some in-game items can also be bought with real money.

WEBSITE
http://alchemistcode.com/

FORUM
http://forums.gumi.sg/thealchemistcode

SOCIAL NETWORK
Facebook: facebook.com/thealchemistcode
Instagram: instagram.com/alchemist_code
Twitter: twitter/alchemist_code

TERMS OF SERVICE & PRIVACY POLICY
http://gumi.sg/terms/

IMPORTANT NOTICE

** THE ALCHEMIST CODE requires a device with Android 4.1 and above.

** A device with a minimum of 1GB RAM is recommended. Performance is not guaranteed on devices with less than 1GB RAM.

** 1.8 GB free space in phone internal memory is recommended to install the game with all of the downloadable contents.

** The game will require you to grant permission to access photos, media, and other files on your device. Enabling this permission will allow game data to be written to your SD card.

** Contact us on https://alchemistww.zendesk.com/ for further help with technical issues.
developerAddress: Sumitomo Fudosan Nishi-Shinjuku Building No. 5, 3F Nishi-Shinjuku 4-34-7 Shinjuku, Tokyo 160-0023 Japan

- Special events and bundles
- Bug fixes and general optimizations
summary: The all-new definitive Strategy RPG, most widely sought-after in Japan!
title: THE ALCHEMIST CODE

comments: the english version of this game pleassssseeeee
We need English versions
please release an english version of this game

I used to play this game before. I quit it because it need to log in using pc or laptop and i changed my pc to macbook and it didnt support it anymore. Seeing this game in mobile game really excite me. Hopefully the developer can make an English version for this game. I will definitely come back to play it.
I know a lil bit Chinese, but this game really need English version/translation cuz it's potential, and I wish there's a trade system in this game :/
Please make an ENGLISH VERSION. I love this pc game. But I would prefer if I can play in my phone. I will rate it 5 stars if you can add English language. Thank you.

comments: Love the fact that you can now try that move you didn't understand why SiFi didn't make. It is fun and realistic enough. I didn't give it a 5 stars because of some of the programing actions available. The waypoints are sometimes more trouble than they are worth. The programmation is limited to 24 hrs. A ruler would be very useful for projections over 24 hrs. But I am enjoying myself, even if my wife doesn't understand why I should wake up at 4 am to check my course.

A good improvement. My only beef is it cost money to change your boat colour. Be prepared to spend if you need to win. Find a few friends to race against and have fun without spending. Since last update keeps eating auto sail cards but only stays on for a few mimutes

Getting close to perfection, need to keep the update of wind to closer to ugrib actual, but very happy with true effect and updates, like the new features of wind display, much better for present and future course determination.  Please look to make driving dial a bit larger, and a bit less sensitive, and possibly a 1 degree up or down feature, like the arrows  but a +1 or minus 1, as feature on present dial is too sensitive and does not adjust so refined.  From a Canadian point of view, can you look to include some races like Vic-maui, Transpac or even more amazing and local to west coast of North America, races such as Swiftsure or Southern Straights... short but very technically sweet races that are very challenging.
Shame you can buy your way to the front of the fleet otherwise good fun.  So I have crossed the finish line 3 time but just keeps saying I have run aground ?? Hopeless

Is lots of fun and surprisingly addictive.  I do mostly just the Volvo Ocean Race.  Would be nice to have an option to overlay exclusion zones.  Don't need to be enforceable, but more fun for those trying to beat the actual fleet.
Great game, but I do get frustrated by it saying wrong sail, after I close the app, and after setting the sail properly.

comments: For a free game? I can't complain too much especially if i don't pay for it. The containers are actually a good addition to this game since you get containers for free. If you're lucky enough you can win a premium tank and those things are not cheap! But wargaming actually give them away for free. The event is impossible to finish if you don't pay with gold and to win a tank you must pay a huge amount of $$$. But for casual and f2p players? I think you'll enjoy it. It's a game guys, play for fun!

The game is good compared to the game i often play online. I could have rated this game all five stars. The controls for driving must have other options to choose from. And its not suitable for android phones that has 5 inches sreen display. My thumb keeps slipping off whenever i try to maneauver the  vehicle. On Pc's much more easier to handle using a keyboard and a mouse.

Hello. I love WOT and trying to play together witg my son. But we've chosen different servers (Europe & Russia) and now i cant find him in the players list to be able to join one platoon. I also cant connect to his server and he cant connect to mine cause system doesnt allow it. can you please suggest how we can join one platoon in this case? Thank you.

Best mobile game I've played, more fun than the PC world of tanks for sure. Only real complaint is that it takes up a lot of space on my phone... It's worth the investment in memory though. Make sure you're in a good wifi spot and have a portable battery and happy tanking

Not a bad game.  I'm a little sick of the unrealistic tanks.  Also the unrealistic play in some ways.  I wish there was a mode that limited you to real tanks of the same time period and had more realistic damage based on the weapons.  For example, I don't want to see the Dracula tank and the 88mm on my Tiger should blow a Sherman away in 1 shot at point blink range, not 6 shots...

Why is 6 of my team on one area while I am in the other. Because of this spawning system I died literally 5 seconds after the battle started. Great game though. Why is there so much lag. And why are my controls frozen. I move forward a  little and then I move 50 feet away from my spot. Fix this and then you get a big fat 5 stars.

descriptionHTML:
Match 3 down THE YELLOW BRICK ROAD™ in a magical puzzle adventure game featuring DOROTHY™, the SCARECROW™, the TIN MAN™ and the COWARDLY LION™!

Magic awaits in the EMERALD CITY™! Join the fun by solving puzzles and unlocking magical movie Moments! Learn fun facts and trivia, and see never-before-seen stills from The Wizard of Oz! Discover the rarest Moments to learn more about your favorite movie!

Match your way to meet the wonderful Wizard of Oz in this amazing puzzle adventure!

MATCH 3 IN THE LAND OF OZ!

- Match even faster with bonuses and power-ups from GLINDA THE GOOD WITCH™! Use Dorothy’s RUBY SLIPPERS™, Munchkin Lollipops and the Tin Man’s Axe to solve puzzles!
- Get help from your favorite movie characters by dropping their Medallions to the bottom of the board. They will appear and provide assistance on your current level!

BATTLE AGAINST THE WICKED WITCH!

If MD White is Real Madrid than, I request you to put the real logo and the name of Real Madrid, Otherwise remove MD White from your game like Bayern Munich.  I request you to do something from above two options and make change in new update.  If you will not change the name and logo of MD White to Real Madrid,  than,           I request to all Real Madrid fans to give one star (1‚òÜ) Ratings to PES 2018.  We Real Madrid fans are waiting for the changing update.                               Thank you.

Super game Control graphic all are perfect But for the lives if it is possible to have it more quickly, or when to play a match it cut less live. Apart of this superb  I rate it 5 in all I love it  But still there are online player who ruin the fun by disconnecting etc  N nexf if you can increase the level of life or decrease the time taken to have life. As it weird you are enjoying the game but when the life is over after 5 match. It weird  Apart from this. You are way tooooooo Good

Its a great game in football I ever played. Admin please add German teams like. Bayern Munich.wolfburge etc.  I enjoy this game. So much fun. I give you 5+5 star for making this wonderful football game. But the new level u1500 online match is not good. I played 2 time in online and score 5 goals after the opponent lost the data connection but I didn't get any reward and rating

To Konami! Game controls are still a nightmare. Can you fix the right  touch in advanced controls. We can't get the ball from opponents, we can't pass,we can't shoot. We need to do this several times for it to work. Do you know that we buy coins to enjoy your super amazing game? And we enjoy it only by at least winning in Superstar level which needs speed and accuracy. Do something and don't annoy us. Kindly

Well overall it is good... Gesture controls are not that much good... So, i insisted to keep on classic controls... It helps me to make a perfect through pass and a perfect finish...but what i couldn't like is the finishing... I love football too much and i am fc barcelona follower... So i will try to make a sequence of passes and boom..! Goal... But i want to score goal by myself... Means that if i want to curve the ball so i can fool the keeper from the long distance... Similar in free kicks... There are many ways to curve the ball in... And game provides the static ways to score in free kick... So please add this functionality...  Moreover of that... I love the game ... It's good... And make it evolve

It keeps matching me with players that are far superior, to the point that it was un-playable (against the computer). The dpad/joystick is a nightmare, it looks like it looses the directtion that was being pressed. When it was working with matched computer skill /player it and the controls were working it was great. It would be good if there was a setting to set your skill level, I'm not really interested in going through improving my skill,I'd rather just kill some time with this game on my commute.

descriptionHTML:
*Philippe Coutinho, currently depicted on the app icon, is still recorded in the game as belonging to Liverpool FC. This data will be revised in the near future with an update that will reflect his current club membership.
*Downloading under Wi-Fi is strongly recommended.


NEW FEATURES TO MAKE MATCHES MORE EXCITING
The authentic soccer action of "PES" has been upgraded with data to match the start of the 2017-2018 season!
With the new "Friend" feature, you can enjoy online matches in realtime against your friends whenever and wherever you want.
If you want to play casually against nearby friends, now you can with "Local Matches" and "Local Leagues", where you create an original tournament. Enjoy heated matches against your friends and clinch the top spot!
Unforgettable soccer Legends will be introduced one after another, including BECKHAM, MARADONA, and ZICO, there's never been a better opportunity to create your ultimate dream!
Matches have been improved with the addition of new gameplay features, such as the Chip Shot and Controlled Shot.
There's also been a big overhaul to the game's sound and visuals.

THE PES 2018 MOBILE EXPERIENCE
Take total control of every action on the field in a way that only the PRO EVOLUTION SOCCER franchise can deliver!
Natural player movements, precision passing, and in-depth tactics bring the true experience of the beautiful game to your mobile device!

SWIPE TO PASS! TAP TO SHOOT!
Controller actions have been optimized to make playing on your mobile device feel as smooth and exciting as a PES action game should! Utilize PES "Advanced" controls for precise passing and controlled shooting. "Classic" virtual pad controls are also available.
Master your technique and feel the excitement of scoring the winning goal in the ultimate action soccer game!

BUILD YOUR WINNING ELEVEN TEAM
Acquire players through Scouts, Agents, or the Scout Auction.
Choose the best players to fit your unique tactics.
Every player is unique and every match is a new experience!Create your very own team and play right away!

OFFICIAL CLUB PARTNERSHIPS
Scout and recruit thousands of soccer stars from the best teams in Europe, South America, and Asia.
Prepare to feel what it takes to play with or against stars like L.MESSI, L.SUÁREZ, INIESTA, PIQUÉ and O. DEMBÉLÉ.

THE OFFICIAL "UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE"!
Experience official visuals from the "UEFA Champions League" as you compete against the top teams in Europe.


[System Requirements]
This app is an online game. Please enjoy the game with stable internet connection.

[Title Display]
If you select Japanese in the language settings of the game application, “Winning Eleven 2018” will be displayed. If you select a language other than Japanese, “PES2018 PRO EVOLUTION SOCCER” will be displayed.

comments: I'm glad that you've finally thrown in 5v5. It's a lot of fun. Many mobas do the same and I enjoy putting my own spin on builds without having to sit in the shop menu in game for 30+ seconds attempting to adjust everything from the standard builds.  Just a thought.  Thanks for this amazing game. =)

But since the update 3.1 I have been getting bad pings but my internet is pretty good above 5 mbps constant an bing are well below 50. So have been getting thumbs down for rude pings. Kindly check i have been playing this gane for almost 2 years now. I dont want to remove the games.

I'm sure it's not just me who is having this problem. I also can't open my EPIC mystery chest, even though I have a key. Fix this.

Nice gameplay, very good looking graphic for a MOBA game, on phone obviously. Very nice and comfortable controls. Impressive multiplayer and, fighting system. But The only problem i found is sometimes i still disconnecting from games due to low internet connection, but i got a solid 10MBps speed. I hope Super Evil MC quickly fixes this up. Really irritating when im fighting with enemy hero and you just "pop" disconnected. The others features are just fine.

50 mbps connection with 47 pings tested during gameplay. Every time i start vainglory 5v5, works well. 10 mins in the ping goes to 30000 ms. I close the game and go to speedtest to check if my network works fine. ITS BEEN WORKING GREAT THE WHOLE TIME. i get back on the game and the ping is still 30000 ms till it goes back to normal after 5 mins. 5 MINS LOST. and after the game is over? DESERTER! do not push updates when your servers cant handle it. Its been happening to many players but they keep on thinking its their nets fault. Smh...

descriptionHTML:
Join with friends or go solo in this breathtaking free-to-play, real-time PvP MOBA filled with dragons, epic heroes and a global community of allies ready to fight by your side. Super Evil Megacorp’s Vainglory 5V5 is the only “no-compromises” MOBA on mobile, providing to players superior gameplay and strategic depth, the most accurate and responsive controls and the best graphics and highest frame rates on mobile.

Sound intense? Only if you want it to be. Have fun your way with casual and competitive experiences ranging from 5-minute BRAWLs to the full 5V5 battle arena experience.

At Super Evil, we believe every phone is a portable next-gen console, and that every mobile player deserves games just as core, strategic and performant as players on PC. Experience the most powerful game engine on the platform — and the most fun you’ve ever had playing on a mobile device.

If your current game was dumbed down for a mobile audience, you deserve better. Never settle for the lesser evil.

THE CATEGORY-DEFINING 5V5 MOBA FOR MOBILE:

- Real line-of-sight Fog of War
- 120 FPS pro-motion support
- Skill-based play & decision-making
- Macro & rotational strategies
- Objective-rich 3-lane map
- Free Camera
- Last-hitting
- Wave Control
- Lane Teleports
- Active items
- Intricate vision system
- Original fantasy characters and storytelling

Vainglory 5V5 is the first and only true MOBA on the mobile platform.

----------------------

"This is one of the best multiplayer experiences on mobile.Vainglory is a totally legit MOBA experience, available any time in the palm of your hand." —IGN

“Best Mobile Game” —2016 Global Mobile Awards

“Some of the best visuals seen on the App Store.” —Macworld UK

----------------------

Features:

== Casual, Ranked and BRAWL Modes ==
Vainglory offers real-time MOBA combat with and against bots or live players. Whether you’re ranking up with your guild or just just have time for five minutes of fun, Vainglory has the gameplay style for you.

== 37+ Playable Heroes & Unlockable skins ==
Master heroes across a variety of themes and playstyles. Make unforgettable plays as a high-damage carry. Attack from the shadows as a menacing jungler. Soak up damage and save your friends as a front-line captain. However you like to play, Vainglory has unique, captivating heroes you’ll love — along with a hunt for skins you can earn through play without spending any money.

== Touch Controls & E.V.I.L Engine Designed for Mobile ==
Designed exclusively for mobile, Vainglory’s game engine is made for jaw-dropping teamfight battles running as high as 120 frames per second. Instead of janky and imprecise joystick controls where you can’t select the target, Vainglory’s pinpoint, sub-30ms touch controls offer the responsiveness and autonomy you need to win. And because everything is just a tap, you’ll attack, move and use spellbinding hero abilities with ease.

== Guilds & Teams ==
Need someone to play with? Vainglory’s built-in Guild Finder makes finding a team at your skill level simple. Create a team to climb ranks as a group or party up with your Guild to have fun and earn more rewards.

== Chests & Quests ==
Every time you play Vainglory, you make progress and collect loot you can use to open chests, unlock skins and hero talents and more. And if you’re lucky, you’ll hit one of the many massive jackpots.

== World-renowned International Mobile Esport ==
Watch and learn from the pros and enjoy some of the best matches you’ve ever seen — and if you’re the best of the best, travel the world and compete for massive prize pools!

== Vibrant Community ==
Vainglory is a global community in 14 different languages that thrives on the support of active players.

----------------------

Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/vainglorygame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/vainglorygame
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/vainglory

- Ban and pick heroes, so every game feels different, with no duplicate heroes in a match.

description: Simon‚Äôs Cat in Crunch Time! -  a Match 3 puzzle adventurePublished by Strawdog.The devilish crows have swiped Simon‚Äôs Cat‚Äôs favourite Tasty Treats and only YOU can help him find them!Join Simon‚Äôs Cat, Maisy, Chloe and Jazz, and a cast of determined kitties on a colourful adventure through some pawsome new places where Treats are just waiting to be eaten.Be ready to collect Tasty Treats, fight off big baddies and befriend a host of animal critters in this FREE puzzle game with added CATitude!Simple and addictive puzzle gameplay! descriptionHTML:
Simon’s Cat in Crunch Time! - a Match 3 puzzle adventure
Published by Strawdog.

The devilish crows have swiped Simon’s Cat’s favourite Tasty Treats and only YOU can help him find them!

Join Simon’s Cat, Maisy, Chloe and Jazz, and a cast of determined kitties on a colourful adventure through some pawsome new places where Treats are just waiting to be eaten.
Be ready to collect Tasty Treats, fight off big baddies and befriend a host of animal critters in this FREE puzzle game with added CATitude!

Simple and addictive puzzle gameplay! Connect the same coloured Treats to make a delicious chain!

Play your way through the neighbourhood in six different game modes and hundreds of challenging levels!

Challenge your friends! Can you beat your friends purrfect high score?
Can you beat the villains? Use your Treats and special boosters to fight off Sir Royston the Pug, Mr Potts, hungry hedgehogs and even a treat crazed vacuum cleaner!
Play with Simon’s Cat featuring brand new animations

Simon's Cat is the internet’s most mischievous cat and has become a global phenomenon. Star of over 60 films, which have been watched over 870 million times, and winner of several major industry awards, Simon's Cat has captured the hearts of a worldwide audience.

We are working hard to update the game with new levels that are purrfectly crafted and will leave you feline great!

And again, I cant get it to reinstall, even after deleting several other apps, including facebook.   UGH!  -„ÄãThey do have great customer  service.  I just wish I didn't  need to use them all the time. At some point it won't  be worth it.  But I really do like it, when  it works!

I really enjoyed this game.  I have no problems with the app.   However, I would have gave it a five but the scratch offs are a joke.  They have 10 to 100 that never come in. I have been a member for years now.    So if you trying to get extra plays from scratch offs don't spend real money. Just play more.

Game seems to be a decent Yahtzee clone. I got it to play with friends and family. Unfortunately it requires you to hook up to Facebook or create and hookup to a Google+ account through Google Play. That's a big nope from me. (Words with Friends doesn't require it, so it can easily be done.)

I really liked playing the game. However, the format of the board is way too big. I have to constantly scroll to see what play I want to make. Slows the game down so much. Put the board back to normal size and single screen with no scrolling. Scratchers need to be a little more generous. The dice masters cheat. Miraculously they roll 5 of a kind to win the game on the last roll. Not cool. Used to be a favorite, but might stop playing.

I like the game, but wonder if you'll ever offer players the chance to unlock some new dice with diamonds. I bet I'm not the only player who has purchased every design possible. Now I'm sitting on over 20K in diamonds. For what?

descriptionHTML:
Dice With Buddies puts a new spin on one of your favorite classic dice games by letting you play multiplayer board games for free with friends, family, or random opponents! Share the fun and play free dice games whether your opponent is sitting next to you or is thousands of miles away! Roll the dice with all your friends in a fun new social board game experience!

Board games are now even easier and more exciting to play! Take on opponents with brand new Custom Dice, an improved interface, Biggest Winner events and premium dice tournaments! Play this exhilarating board game from the same account on any Android tablet or phone! Roll the dice with all your friends in a fun new social board game experience!

How to Play Dice with Buddies:

Dice With Buddies is a dice game where players need to score as many points as possible, by rolling five dice to make different combinations. This free dice game consists of 13 rounds with the scorecard having 13 categories. In each round, you can roll the dice up to three times and choose which scoring category is to be used for that round. Once a category has been used in the game, it cannot be used again. To get the best dice score, a player would have to roll five-of-a-kind and score 50 points; the highest of any category. The winner is the player who scores the most points.

This dice game has also been referred to as Poker Dice since there combinations such as Full House, Three of a Kind, Four of a Kind, Small Straight, Large Straight – all that resemble Poker.

If you love Yathzee, Yatzy and Farkle you would love Dice With Buddies! Play this classic dice game with your friends and family, and prepare to have fun!

===Dice With Buddies Features===

Board Games with Buddies! Multiplayer Games and More:
• Dice tournaments give you a new thrilling challenge each day!
• Dice Master Showdown! Beat the daily Dice Master for huge XP and bonus dice roll prizes!
• Dice tournaments give you a new thrilling challenge each day!

Dice Game Bonuses
• Dice games come with in-game scratchers to win bonus dice rolls
• Activate a bonus dice roll to get an extra boost right when you need it

Social Games with Friends
• Play with friends and family through Facebook
• Multiplayer games with random opponents – Play dice games with players around the world
• Dice game chat room – Joke and heckle with your opponents!

Dice Game Customization:
• CUSTOM DICE – Personalize your board game experience!
• Test your dice skills to level up your frames by earning Achievements!

Fans of card games and fun social experiences will LOVE Dice With Buddies! Addictive games with friends await in Dice With Buddies! Download today and roll the dice on your Android device!
