comments: It's an OK game with pretty complex party building mechanics. But, it also has terrible progression that almost pushes you to spend cash if you're not patient.    And the controls...  For a mobile game, the controls is not very responsive, sometimes I decided to drag a character to attack and the game decided to instead move the character forward and switches with the front unit, in a game where formation matters, this breaks the whole system, and so in order to prevent that, you'll have to drag it slowly, so it registers properly   The hit box is also pretty terrible, sometimes I decided to attack but then it didn't register because I didn't hit the right hit box.   Overall the game itself is not bad, but it has slow progression and getting the 5* (which is very necessary especially the raid class item) is very hard, definitely play this game if you are a very patient person.
Problems solved. Thank you
I give this a 5. I'm F2P and the ??

It's can be fun game(for a short)if you are not interested in the competitive aspect. If you want to be competitive you gotta spend a lot of real money because of prestige.Prestige xa give you additionnal stats to your unit.  You need to spend more than 800$ to have every stats bonus only avaible with prestige. You can gain a few prestige every year but they increase the prestige cap faster.  Pvp is boring, from bronze to silver all i had to do is put a tank on capture point to win. And now i have been losing 95% of all of my matches in gold( and i cant fall back i silver even if i only losses)  Guild arent interesting if you arent super powerfull as you do 0.1% of what a big player does.  It takes a long time to even be somewhat strong.  Pve is ok but really short if its the only thing you do.

This game can be spendy but even without buying anything, you can still advance quickly. There are known bugs but it is address very quickly. I definitely enjoy the gameplay and involvement of the whole community to grow your team.

Normally, I don't give freemium pay to win games 5 stars, but this one is different. Basically all the money options are crazily overpriced, but if you put the time in they give you tons of premium currency just for playing. I've been playing for awhile and it hasn't slowed down yet. I just wish they had a decently priced option because I'd like to support the developers, but there isn't really a good option, monetarily, to do that. Everything cheap is lackluster and anything worthwhile is expensive.    If you like tactics games this game can definitely holds your attention for awhile.

descriptionHTML:
Valiant Force, the highly-anticipated mobile strategy RPG (role-playing game), is finally here! Forming teams from over 200 unique heroes and 40 diverse jobs, players are tasked to explore the vast and dangerous world of Arathos to save its inhabitants from an awakening evil. Embark on an epic adventure in Valiant Force now!

KEY GAME FEATURES

☆ Turn-based strategy RPG
Test your strategic skills on the classic 3x6 grid battlefield. Move your heroes to the right positions, and trigger each hero's aura. Become a true master of tactical combat!

☆ 40+ specialized jobs, 200+ unique heroes
Valiant Force offers a variety of specialized jobs and heroes to choose from. Form your team and choose your paths!

☆ 500+ items to craft and collect
Power up your heroes with different rarities of equipment obtained from dungeon loot or crafted using materials. There are over 500 different items to collect!

☆ Epic boss events
Face off against the most terrifying boss monsters found in Valiant Force in special boss event dungeons. Awesome loot awaits!

☆ Build and upgrade your Garrison
Build your garrison to buff heroes, send them on expeditions, get more gold, gems, experience points, and much more. With limited land, choose your structures wisely!

☆ PVP Arena
Test you mantle and squad strength in the PVP arena! Climb up the rankings in the most intense strategy-based PVP system ever, and become a true tactician of the battlefield!

☆ Rune System
Strengthen your heroes using the grid-based Rune System. Mix and match the runes which will aid your hero during battles. Unique unlockable passive skills await!

☆ Guild System
Gather your friends and families to form guilds! Exclusive features and bonuses awaits all guild member, with more features in development.

☆ Audio masterpiece
Immerse in Valiant Force's music, composed by former Square Enix veteran, Mr Hitoshi Sakimoto and Basiscape.

☆ Visual masterpiece
Stunning 2D art drawn in-house at XII Braves, along with detailed 3D models

Coming soon:

- New heroes
- New items
- New maps
- New Conquest mode
... and more!

Connect with us on social media!

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/ValiantForce/


Copyright © 2016 XII Braves and FunPlus. All Rights Reserved.

comments: I think this game has potential. The gameplay is fun and so far I enjoyed the pvp battle. I gave a 4 star because the game lacks variety in the early levels - I don't feel myself making any progress after playing for two hours. Also,  the game is pushing too hard to sell their ingame currency and bundles, reminds me of those cheaply made games with a sole purpose to scam your money.  Please create a better sales strategy because this game has more potential than that

I would have given it a 5 however the game will not connect to play unless it is via wifi. The game is great and it's fun to play. It's unfortunate that this game now has such a connect issue. I am a few days from uninstalling the game. Again, its a great game, adicting and plays beautifully...until this last update.
BAD CONNECTION ISSUES WITH LATEST PATCH. Pretty fun, but it's never able to find a game while on 4G. I have to connect to wifi (slower!) for matchmaking to work.
Pretty good. I am able to go pretty far without purchasing anything but I am sure money makes it easier.   Only complaint is there are no PVE missions. That would totally make this a 5 star game.

I might've given 4/5 stars for this game but i rate it lower due to game lack of honesty. 90 or 80 percent chance of success means 90 or 80 percent of failure. im fed up being failed upgrade despite 90 percent chance of success failed several times on highest tier ship which req lits of golds. ssounds like a rigged slot machine but too obvious
Three different options for the controls, including a "pro" option, but  no option for inverted y-axis. Clearly the developer has no idea what pro actually means.  Uninstalled as soon as I saw that.

descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers.

Space beta testing:
Please be aware that the game is still in development and does not represent a final version. This is a beta release. Please take this into account when leaving comments and ratings.
The game is not complete, and many aspects of it remain to be completed and polished in the future. We ask you to keep this in mind with your comments and ratings. We’re working hard on Planet Commander Online so you can enjoy it!

About:
Have you always dreamed of spaceships and space combat space battles? Check out the first mobile online game with direct control of your own spaceship and space travel.

In Planet Commander manticore, you are the captain of a galaxy spaceship. You start with a small spaceship, but as your pilot character grows and develops, you will end up commanding huge battleships and super-heavy spaceships. Battle galaxy on fire online with real opponents in the multiplayer space wars game mode and develop your space fleet.

The galaxy on fire and space need a commander like you! Become a legend in a galaxy on fire! Let the spaceship battles begin!

Planet Commander’s online space battles features:
- 5 spacecraft interstellar spaceships classes (from light to super-heavy vehicles: frigates, destroyers, battleships, carriers, super heavy warships), each can carry a variety of equipment.
- More than 20 spaceships to choose from, entering combat with different tactics.
- Each space battleship can be fully customized and improved: Planet Commander features over 100 different armaments and modules. You can even add your own logo and repaint your ship!
- Eve online dreadnought spaceships ""like"" gameplay
- Beautiful homeworld locations: enter battles aboard spacecraft with your squad in space as well as within planetary atmospheres and space exploration!
- Awesome space game mobile 3D graphics!

Join Planet Commander’s game space battle community!

https://www.facebook.com/planetcommander/

comments: Great gameIncredible game. But when you move up in lvls the cost of every detail is ludacris! I've played this game a month and spent good money on it.  I am not into waiting a half a day so I can gain a 5 min advantage, then turn around and do it again. Only this time, just wait longer! .... Or of course you could just spend be re $.... Awesome game... makers are greedy!

I'm not happy that I can only send 20 gold from my accounts to one of my accounts per day. I'd like to send more gold per day. Annoying 2 alliance war battle limit should be gotten rid of. It's annoying, expensive and takes a very long time to reach each level of the game. Overall, it's a good game to play but it can be improved

The last few days this game become completely useless and unplayable. The matchmaking has been tweaked to the point where I'm being attacked by significantly higher players, without even a possibility to retaliate! At the same time when I try to attack in quick match, the level of my opponents is being so high, that I have zero chances winning a simple attack.  I'm thinking about uninstalling this game permanently. When contacted, Zynga employee suggests to spend more money to upgrade my defenses. How is that for "humanly friendly" customer service? Horrible service.
After getting to HQ level 10 it just got so boring.  To be honest don't like the game play playing against other people either.  The play is slanted toward the attacker .  Deleted

It's quite unreasonable that the nuke is too close to other command items! So, please give me back a nuke, and 40000 fuels as well as 5000 metals for reviving robot and retraining tanks! Also put the nuke to other corners!

Game has a fun, friendly community of players. Load times kinda slow. Occational bugs and glitches. Usually following after updates. Overall though a fun game that has new features added frequently, keeping it interesting.

comments: Starting my second character. Look to all you perfect people out there who never do anything wrong and have it all figured out. This game isn't perfect but have to say that it's the only one I can think of that I have played for more than a year straight and have now started a second! Even my Wife started playing her own character and that is saying everything if you new her. P.S. Good luck if you are ever unfortunate enough to meet me on the field of battle.

The game itself is good fun, but it's ruined by anything but normal missions can't be completed without buying gold from the Gree store, the most frustrating thing is the constant crashes. I am running a completely up to date, vanilla Pixel2 and a 25mbps network and it will crash almost every time, no amount of updates to the game over the past 3 or more years, or my multiple platforms, has changed this. There is massive lag everytime you conduct an action, or change screens. Please, please make it more quick & stable!

Gree support sucks. They don't typically solve problems, or even provide appropriate responses to questions. Tapjoy doesn't pay out gold offers and isn't held accountable by Gree to stand by their offers. Game has come down hill over the years.

Game was good when was under the hands of Funzio.unfortunately ever since Gree takeover, there had been nothing but glitches, dishonest scrupulous non-ethical in-game strategies to trick players of their progress and money. I wouldn't advise players to continue spending or start playing this game

Very slow, lags, when you tap on anything, attack, raid, change base, deploy units, buy units.  Just takes forever. That's on Android phone, and on iPad 2, takes 5 mins to start, then will just crash, used to work sometimes.  I have been playing for a few years, and it just gets worse.  Otherwise would be good, but if you spend money on gold, it should work.

Gree either just doesn't care about the customers that play this game,  or they have  hired a bunch of bumbling idiots. Always have the same mistakes and problems every time anything is changed, new campaigns, etc. Hard to advance if you don't spend real money, but why spend money on a game with such a crappy team running it?? Don't waste your time unless your goal is aggrivation and frustration.

descriptionHTML:
Build a global military empire and destroy your enemies in Modern War by GREE!

World Domination is now within your grasp! Join a faction and join the fight in Modern War, the popular combat game where you face off against enemies for control of country after country, until you rule ‘em all.

Taking over the world isn’t for the weak. Build strength in numbers by teaming up with other players and pooling rewards from individual missions. Then, declare war against rival factions during monthly three-day World Domination events for the chance to put your name on the map—literally. Because in Modern War, it’s not enough to want power, you have to take it.

Features:
• Free-to-play MMORPG military combat game
• Form a faction with friends and other players
• Fight in monthly LIVE World Domination events
• Attack rivals for control of countries and territories
• Run a command center and build fortifications
• Get elected as a faction “Defense Leader”
• See your winning faction’s name on a world map

Visit our Forums: funzio.com/forum
Follow us on Twitter: @ModernWar
Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/GREEModernWar
Watch us on YouTube: youtube.com/GREEgames

NOTES:
• This is an ONLINE ONLY game. You must be connected to the Internet to play.
• Modern War - World Domination is suitable for fans of strategy, rpg and mmo games.

comments: Well it's one of the best games I've played. The only problem I'm having is that on multiplayer  there is new real order some races you can smoke a guy others you can get smoked and have no chance of winning. If you could update to change that I would have a lot more fun with this game

Great game for a short while unless you have money to dump in it. Once you get to your 7th or 8th car, the prices sky rocket. Oh and the last car? Will take you weeks to make enough money to purchase because the online races are RARELY fair. I often am matched with the class above my car who has nearly as many mechanical points into it. Doesn't make sense, losing streaks of 10 or more happens frequently. Good luck if you want a fun and rewarding FREE experience. No luck needed if you dump money into it and a lot of money, their p2p packages very expensive.

Fun racing game.  Good time waster, as with most games like this, you can NEVER upgrade your cars enough.  Free crates don't drop parts needed enough, Elite crates take way to many tokens.  And there again the chance of getting great parts or Free cars are NOT going to drop for you.  And the Tuning is very complicated.  And way to many online cheaters, that you can hardly beat.

Everything is awsome about it besides one thing   That ome this is when your storage is full and you get a surprise part from racing it only gives you two options to discard it or to buy a new slot. what would really be helpfull is if you could trade a part for it and instead of having to discard it
Awesome Game! A bits a bit hard to level up and lock the super cars though. Also cars are very expensive. Wish there was SUVS and pickups as well! Other than that great game easy controls and all

If you don't plan on spending money don't even both. It cost me $20 just to get out of the first level. Then you win all these prizes but can only collect them if you spend real money on there gold. $$$ so sad because it is a fun game.
description: For those who live life 1/4 mile at a time, Nitro Nation is the most addictive drag racing game!Race, mod and tune dozens of real licensed cars. A must have for the speed-addicted." - The App Zine"Nitro Nation Online is a beautiful drag racing game with a vibrant online community" - Pocket MetaLOTS OF CARS - Supercars and Exotics? Check. Tuners and Street racers? Check. Classic and Modern muscle? You bet! The best part? descriptionHTML:
For those who live life 1/4 mile at a time, Nitro Nation is the most addictive drag racing game!


Race, mod and tune dozens of real licensed cars. Start a team, invite your friends, win tournaments. Trade parts with other drag racers online and build your dream car.

"It's almost dangerously simple to pick up and play" - Pocket Gamer

"Nitro Nation Online is one of the best drag racers out there... A must have for the speed-addicted." - The App Zine

"Nitro Nation Online is a beautiful drag racing game with a vibrant online community" - Pocket Meta


LOTS OF CARS - Supercars and Exotics? Check. Tuners and Street racers? Check. Classic and Modern muscle? You bet! The best part? There's always more of them coming to the game!

We know you love drag racing cars, we have more than 100 real cars from top international car brands like Audi, BMW, Chevrolet, Chrysler, Dodge, Ford, Jaguar, Mercedes-Benz, Nissan, Subaru, Volkswagen - and many more!


FAIR PLAY - no "fuel" that you have to wait for. Free of "delivery time" for cars or upgrades. Every vehicle is competitive and there are no "premium" upgrades. It's all about player driving skill and dedication.


REAL RACERS & TEAMS – we’re all about multiplayer racing, there's always an online rival waiting for you on the street or the track. Start by racing any distance from 1/8 to a full mile, join or create a team, win tournaments with your crew, work your way up the leaderboard rankings, or test your nerves in wager races.

Join a Live Multiplayer race, play in real time with friends and opponents all over the world! Compete in weekly Regional tournaments and work your way up through the Bronze and Silver divisions to the Worldwide Gold Elite Racing division!


EPIC UPGRADES - Upgrade and improve 33 unique car components with 3 tiers of aftermarket blueprints. Satisfy your need for speed and build a one-of-a-kind top drag racing machine. Ever dreamed of smoking an exotic sports car in your 800 HP Volkswagen Golf? Happens every day on the streets of NN.


PERSONAL TOUCH – customize your drag car with cool decals, arrange them the way you like. Choose your own custom paint color and finish for every bit. Add real Toyo Tires and aftermarket Tec Speedwheels rims, install aftermarket bumpers, skirts and spoilers to give your car a unique look!


CAR GEEKS WELCOME – powered by the CarX Physics Engine, we have the most realistic car physics on the market - everything works the way it does in real life. Tune your gears with detailed specs, dyno graphs, gearing charts and advanced race statistics will help you put your racing knowledge to use.


AWESOME COMMUNITY - It's all about the multiplayer experience! Connect with other car game fanatics, make some new friends and enjoy NN together:
Website: http://goo.gl/RKfHi4
Forums: http://goo.gl/X3O1D6
Facebook: https://goo.gl/tufLX3
Twitter: https://goo.gl/hIupCP
Instagram: https://goo.gl/aXOjqI


TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS
The fully installed game requires at least 1.5 GB in your internal storage
OS: Android 4.x or higher
Device: 1 GB of RAM
Wifi: Internet connection is required


TROUBLESHOOTING
If you forgot your password, you can reset it using the corresponding option on the login screen. Check your e-mail for instructions.If you haven't set up a recovery e-mail, or if you forgot your username, please contact us at https://support.creative-mobile.com and tell us everything that can help identify your account.

If you have any questions, make sure you check out our FAQ at https://support.creative-mobile.com
...or use one of the two ways to contact us through our Support system: https://support.creative-mobile.com/Tickets/Submit or via e-mail at support@creative-mobile.com

Privacy Policy: http://nitronation.com/policy/
Terms of Use: http://nitronation.com/terms-of-use/

comments: Love the addiction you get from this game! While trying to survive from a plane crash, you wind up in the midst of a mystery. Thank goodness for the friendly ghost the first survivor named Bob! And what about those clothes that lay about as if the people just disapparated out of them! Excellent game like no other I've seen!

Game could be good but what has candy crush got to do with anything? If I wanted to play candy crush I'd be playing candy crush (which is far more refined than your knock off). The game doesn't need this ridiculous addition. I mean sorry before you unlock this door you just have to solve this candy crush puzzle.... so realistic!

I don't like that the first thing I have to do when I open the game is feed people, make them happy, and give them a shower before I can do any task. Makes me not want to bother. Maybe if the health and happiness wouldnt dwindle so fast. I can't keep them satisfied all day. I got a job man.

Finally started enjoying this game. Played it as far as I could till I caught up to the point you'd written it too. Then my phone died and I got a new one. Reloaded it and all my progress is gone. I'm back at the start. I'm logged in to Google play and all my achievements are there, but starting at the beginning. Also, I can't find anywhere in game to contact you, so this is it. Please help.

Remove the match three games and make this a real survivor game! Why do I have to play your version of Candy Crush to get anywhere in the game. Crab soup? Match 3. Try the radio? Match 3! Give me a real game instead of the CC wannabe and I will reinstall it.

Game was really good until you had to play 3 levels of match 3 to progress after all the running around collecting items and keeping your characters fed etc, match 3 levels got hard real quick and time lessened way too quickly. Inventory would go missing in between games which is frustrating. Could be better!

comments: The game has bugged out now the hero's that did the time challenges are stuck I cant get them back.  I think it happend when the anniversary update hit and I put them in a time challenges during the time.  When I prestige and go to the time challenges it goes straight back to the main menu. And when i do have hero's  in the adventure mode it cuts to them when I pick the time challenges.  Please fix this.  And also happy anniversary üòÄ   Problem was fixed thank you very much!üòä

The game is fine but like all mobile games or eventually gets to the point where it's purely about you parting with money to proceed. That being said even tho this game uses ads for it's reward system it's actually quite pleasant, at no point did it become ridiculous or over the top. I really do appreciate how much of a back seat it it feels like the adds are taking to gameplay.

Almost A Hero is an incredibly fun game with lots of interesting heros to use to battle near endless hordes of baddies. I find myself loading up the game multiple times a day to grab the free chest as well as to push through another couple waves before my next prestige. I highly recommend this to anyone interested in this genre!

Update: Ads are broken. I watched almost any that were presented to me in order to get farther faster but now they literally always load up a few seconds, then the game like restarts and I get jack from it. Dudes! Please fix, I am so very rarely addicted to a game like I am/was with this!!  Literally the best clicker/idle game I've ever played. I was glued to my phone for all of my free time five days straight because new and awesome stuff kept getting unlocked.
Good game until today where its asking me to update my game to continue to updates available so im now unable to play. 4 maybe 5 stars once its fixed. Good game till this issue started.
It's real cute and a really nice curve but there's a lot stuffed into the UI that's a little obtrusive, but they've got to make money so I understated why üòä good game, would recommend

descriptionHTML:
Almost A Hero is probably one of the most addicting RPG clicker games you will find out there today. In this incremental RPG clicker game, you will meet 13 wannabe heroes, also known as the most useless idiots to walk this earth, who embark on a quest to be slightly less useless idiots.

They say never give a loser an even chance. We say different.

Your team of almost heroes is a bunch of deeply unique and deeply flawed individuals who have been chosen for greatness. Heroic, noble, enlightened... Just 3 of the many words they can’t spell. They will set off on an epic journey that will turn them from zeroes to almost heroes. Or dead people. More likely the latter.

Join these zeroes on a quest to become (almost) heroes in an ancient land. Train them to learn battle skills, magical powers and which end of a sword is the business end.

If you are into clicker games, RPG clicker game or incremental idle games, get ready to discover your next serious addiction with “Almost a Hero - RPG Clicker Game”.

In AaH you’ll find heroes with upgrades, quests, ancient artifacts and secrets to unlock. Oh, and there’s lots of clicking to do. Yup, that’s what clicker games are all about. Have you nearly got what it takes to become almost a hero?

Download one of the most addicting clicker games, Almost a Hero - RPG Clicker Game today and lead your idle heroes to victory before it’s too late!

comments: Fun game, good story lines, and addictive. I think this is one of my favorite shall we datw games. It's easier to earn the main currency then most of the other games. My only thing I don't nessisarily like is that the story tickets take a while to build back up, although that's kind of a running theme for most of these games and some others take way longer. Over all I enjoy this game.

Fun stories and lovable characters. The only issue is that the amount of jade needed overall for one characters main story is a bit high. I would also like the opportunity to win or use gold/jade to get the side stories. Finally there's almost no point to having gold. The 4 rating is because despite the cost in time and money I still wanted to finish the story. It would be great if we could buy entire main stories.

Please update more stories and events on this! Also, can't you lower the price of tickets? Seems like tickets are more expensive than diamonds. If not lower prices then at least add more tickets like 10 or 15 for 20$? Pretty please! Well either you change it or not I just want to say. I LOVE THEM STORIES ARE DAMN ROMANTIC AND INTERESTING! Love it! Make more event prizes that involves a lot more diamonds and tickets please! THANK YOU LOVE~ | Update: more season 2 of characters please!!!

Addictive, very entertaining stories with good music, colorful graphics, and great characters! My issues with this game is a money dumper! It'll make you spend money to fully complete the stories. In between chapters, you are giving a certain amount of time to complete the mini games or whatever the task may be, which is impossible, in order to receive those special pages.  So it's fun, but there is no way to fully complete stories for free...

I really enjoy the storyline - it doesn't involve too much comedy or anything like that - but it isn't extremely serious either. I love the characters, and I wanna unlock everything possible that involves Ukyo. I do feel that the art for some characters Can be a bit better..(eduard's arm Always being up is a bit awkward). My biggest complaint is that there are many hard to reach checkpoints. But other than that, it's very fun and interesting!

The game is quite good till the part i played but the only problem which i have with this game is after the prologue. After finishing chapter 1 part 1 i can't seem to be able to play the story. It goes completely blank. HURTS !! I couldn't even get a chance to pick my choice ;(
description: It is Edo period, and Japan is still a country closed off to the rest of the world. In order to save your village and seek revenge, you must impersonate your twin brother, Village Chief and ninja. But the task at hand is not so easy‚Ä¶ as you are his sister! You join a group of ninja vigilantes hell-bent on cleansing the corrupt City of Nagasaki. On the path to vengeance, you never expected to find love‚Ä¶‚ô•The Story‚ô•You‚Äôve found yourself surrounded by the most skilled ninjas in all of Nagasaki. descriptionHTML:
It is Edo period, and Japan is still a country closed off to the rest of the world. In order to save your village and seek revenge, you must impersonate your twin brother, Village Chief and ninja. But the task at hand is not so easy… as you are his sister! You join a group of ninja vigilantes hell-bent on cleansing the corrupt City of Nagasaki. On the path to vengeance, you never expected to find love…

♥The Story♥

You’ve found yourself surrounded by the most skilled ninjas in all of Nagasaki. Carrying out vigilante missions with your instructor, you must keep your identity a secret. However, you find yourself growing closer to him…Will he find out your true identity? Will you capture the heart of an elite Commissioner…or help an enigmatic interpreter recover his lost memories?

Your path will be fraught with obstacles, but make the right decisions, and you will find
yourself in a romance that will go down in history.

♥The Characters♥
♥The Assertive Commissioner - Ukyo
His loveable personality means he is often relied on. As your instructor, he takes you under his wing, and you grow close. His caring nature softens your guard, and soon you realize your undeniable attraction to him. What will he do when he discovers your true feelings?!
“Come on... Just tell me you love me”

♥The Mysterious Interpreter - Eduard
Because of his severe memory loss, his intentions are shrouded in mystery. He does not say much, but deep down you know how kind-hearted he actually is. Through the process of helping him recover his memories, he realizes how much you mean to him. How will you respond to his shocking confession?!

“Your smile brings me so much joy”

♥The Snarky Oracle - Asagi
Coming from a family of oracles, he is constantly compared to his great father, which puts him under immense pressure. By sharing each other’s secrets, your relationship grows deeper. Can you melt his heart of ice?!
“Can I kiss you?”

Your destiny is in your hands.
Your mission? To find true love.

♥Features♥
♥ Play free of charge
♥ Read stories with Story Tickets, which are given out daily
♥ Enjoy multiple endings for each character.
♥ story endings vary depending on the choices you make
♥ Dress up your character in cute outfits
♥ Join in-game events to receive exclusive stories, pictures, avatar items and more…
♥ Link your account on Facebook

♥About Us♥
NTT Solmare is a Japanese company based in Osaka, Japan. We strive to make the best dating simulation apps for adults. Our Otome dating sims are free! If you like romance novels, visual novels, cute guys, or anime then we think that you will love our games! Our Shall We Date? Series have over 32 million downloads!! So download one of our free romance games today, and find out why our dating games are so popular!

comments: It was a lot better before I did the last update. There's 2 changes I really do not like amongst others. #1. I do not like how your money has to replenish to the amount of the table that you're playing on whenever you lose a hand. #2. Not being able to play on the named tables like we used to be able to,eg Lowballer-Card Sharks 3 or Big Dog-Big Boys 2. That's just a couple of reasons why I changed from 5 stars to 1 and barely play this game anymore.

This used to be a really great game. You could join a table and your friends local or from out of state could join your table.  You could communicate with them while waiting for the table to fill or poke fun at them for losing a hand! Being able to pick your table not only let you play with friends but the wait time for a table to fill was cut in half. This feature alone is what made this game stand out among the rest... five stars for how it used to be!  I do want to say thank you for making a great product pre update! I had years of fun playing with friends and family until the update.   ***A friendly request, please put the option to choose a table back in the game the way it used to be. Thank you for all your hard work!

Playing rounds u dont get them marked for playing. U dont always recevie your daily bouns either. This has been going on a regular basis. I have also noticed that if a player has the most $$$ on the table u loose most of your hands. I have been playing this game since 2015 n now I can even get in the game.  I do know if it's the game or Google , but I think  it is fair.

This game is a total rip off. You win chips and then buy in to tourneys.  The app crashes and you can't rejoin your table even after rebooting.  You send a ticket to the site management and the don't resolve the issue and you repeatedly receive generic messages. Obviously forcing you to buy chips. Don't trust this site as it most probably steals your personal data and shares it against your will.

If I could I wouldn't give this rigged ass site no stars!!!!! It's designed to let you win in the beginning, & once you build up chips.......its designed for you to lose so you can PURCHASE chips!!!! Once I uninstall this time, won't be coming back, plus I've told my friends to stay away

App crashes EVERY TIME you use it. Returning to the lobby freezes the app EVERY TIME. Graphics are simple and 2-d, yet animation is still choppy and slow. And I use a Nexus 6P on fast WiFi to play, so the app is clearly the problem. Also, try playing 3 straight hands without some moron going all in on a 2-7 off suit. Everything about this experience sucks.

comments: Great game

not sure about the rating questions. Complex as in difficult? No. complex in features, absolutely. simple as in boring? heck no. but easy to learn and play. very straight forward and relaxing which is what i look for in a game. graphics are stellar. game advances relatively quickly. have seen no glitches or issues so far. i'm only at level 2 or 3 so can't say how difficult it will be over time. if you like hidden objects games, you should like this one.

Could not possibly be more of a money grab. There are about four different internal payment systems, but no interchange between them. You can get more by paying CASH MONEY NOW or by waiting until enough time has elapsed for some of them to have increased. If you're looking for something you can play for more than 15 mins, forget it. If you've run out of time in the crystal matching game, you can watch ad's to get bonus time - except when this crashes, so it loses your progress and the cost to get into that level. And then there's the assignments which appear on your list, but aren't available to you until you've gone up three more levels. Utterly pointless and incredibly frustrating.

This is a really good game but I have to agree with other players that the game crashes a heck if a lot and you will find that you pay for items that you never receive. I have contacted them on two occasions about this and fair to say it was sorted. However the last time this happened (about a week ago) I tried to report it but it would not allow me to submit my complaint. Players beware.

I downloaded and played for a couple of levels. Suddenly it told me to download more things. No choice in the matter. Then it wouldn't download. Over an hour waiting and it hadn't gotten past 2%, then suddenly it went back to zero!

Because you have to purchase so many items to actually play the game, its disappointing to say the least!  I'm thinking I may have to uninstall it soon!  If they would consider changing it so you didn't have to purchase items for everything, I may consider keeping it!  Otherwise, it sucks, its no fun to play!

descriptionHTML:
Get ready for a Lewis Carroll inspired hidden object game that takes you to a mystical Victorian-era London known as Albion, fraught with intrigue, crime, and danger. Just like Alice in her quest of Wonderland, you’ll have to solve challenging puzzles and encounter unexplained mysteries. Experience the game's unique story by tackling countless quests in your mission to foil the evil schemes of the Queen of Hearts. Download Alice in the Mirrors of Albion and begin your adventure in this truly extraordinary magical world right now!

***KEY FEATURES***
✔ UNCOVER HIDDEN OBJECTS
Track down all sorts of items in several exciting game modes and explore tons of places, from the dangerous outskirts of Albion to elegant Victorian-era studies and cozy confectioneries.
✔ MEET INTRIGUING CHARACTERS
Get carried away by the magical world behind the mirror, full of heroes you’ve known since childhood as well as unique new characters, all of whom have something to hide.
✔ REVEAL INTRIGUES AND FIGHT CRIME
Engage in exciting battles with Albion crime lords and prove that you are the one who can bring order the city and learn all its secrets.
✔ IMMERSE YOURSELF IN THE MYSTERIOUS DETECTIVE STORY
Go on a quest through Foggy Albion, a city full of thieves, puzzles, and wonder. Discover things no one else has seen!
✔ EXPLORE NEW PLACES EVERY DAY
Earn experience points to gain access to incredible new places and buildings! If you’re hungry for more, you can always purchase keys to new locations and other items within the game for real money.
✔ THIS GAME WORKS IN OFFLINE MODE WITHOUT INTERNET — enjoy it on a plane, on the subway, on the road!

comments: I'm a big mahjong player and this game is like mahjong on crack. i definitely recommend it to my fellow mahjong nerds. it's awesome with how many levels there are and boosters and achievements and the whole shebang. not just a regular mahjong game where you can only play the game and nothing more. if you like the whole saving up crystals and buying boosters and earning achievements jawn, then you'll love this game. side note, I also have not spent real life money on this game mostly because I don't need to. I usually will buy stuff for games only because I use the money I get from my Google rewards app cause that money goes straight into my Google play account. so it's not that I'm anti spending money on games, but I haven't yet felt like I needed to. it's not one of those where you need to spend money to have it be fun at all (well, not yet anyway! hopefully that won't change) or to be able to get past a certain point. so I totally recommend this to all my mahjong nerd brothers and sisters!

It is a shame that this game allows one to start a new mod and a day or two later sends the player back to the original mod to collect hats, lanterns or eggs. A more polite end to an uncompleted game would be "Try Again!" rather than "You lose!" This the most rude end that I have seen on any of these games.

So far its good! Just wish you would not link all your games like you do it bogs the games down. And wish you would fix it so that if you had a game several years ago in which you used your email address you could reuse it even if you can't remember your password

A different spin on the classic MahJong game. It's fast-paced  and sometimes it doesn't respond as quick as I  would like. I wish the game would allow just a little more time because it is difficult to see the different levels to find all the matching tiles.

I love this game. However I do have problems with the loading. It says there is no internet connection which is not true. I have fast ADSL and it is connected all the time. Why don't I have problems with other games then? They all work perfectly. Please look into this matter. Thanking you.

I paid 1.99 for 40 eggs and game earned the other 5... and the "unique prize" was 5 gems.... I would think it would be something a little more...idk just more. Other than that, the game is awesome. Love the whole idea. Levels, like any other of the "saga" games with mahjong.
description: Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers!Embark on a magical journey in this addictive Mahjong Solitaire adventure!Enjoy a new take on Mahjong Shanghai as you help a young girl and her grandfather traverse the globe in search of her lost parents. Make your way by pairing tiles in order to dismantle hundreds of layouts. Collect achievements for special accomplishments while taking advantage of innovative gameplay twists like Shuffle, which allows you to get out of a difficult situation, or Firecracker, a tool for blowing up multiple pairs of tiles. Visit the Forbidden City, Virupaksha Temple, the Taj Mahal and the famous Mount Fuji as you fulfill challenging quests and earn gold stars for completing levels as fast as you can!While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.‚óè Master over 1100 immersive levels (with hundreds more coming in free updates)‚óè Match 1134 types of tiles in 27 different tile sets (with more coming in free updates)‚óè Earn over 40 desirable achievements and utilize four groundbreaking power-ups‚óè Enjoy gorgeous graphics, rich sounds and regular free updates with new levels, tile sets and more‚óè Google Play game services support______________________________ COMPATIBILITY NOTES: This game performs best on high-end smartphones and tablets.______________________________ VISIT US: www.g5e.com WATCH US: www.youtube.com/g5enter FIND US: www.facebook.com/g5games FOLLOW US: www.twitter.com/g5gamesTerms of Service: http://www.g5e.com/termsofserviceG5 End User License Supplemental Terms: http://www.g5e.com/G5_End_User_License_Supplemental_Terms
descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers!

Embark on a magical journey in this addictive Mahjong Solitaire adventure!

Enjoy a new take on Mahjong Shanghai as you help a young girl and her grandfather traverse the globe in search of her lost parents. Make your way by pairing tiles in order to dismantle hundreds of layouts. Collect achievements for special accomplishments while taking advantage of innovative gameplay twists like Shuffle, which allows you to get out of a difficult situation, or Firecracker, a tool for blowing up multiple pairs of tiles. Visit the Forbidden City, Virupaksha Temple, the Taj Mahal and the famous Mount Fuji as you fulfill challenging quests and earn gold stars for completing levels as fast as you can!

While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

● Master over 1100 immersive levels (with hundreds more coming in free updates)
● Match 1134 types of tiles in 27 different tile sets (with more coming in free updates)
● Earn over 40 desirable achievements and utilize four groundbreaking power-ups
● Enjoy gorgeous graphics, rich sounds and regular free updates with new levels, tile sets and more
● Google Play game services support
______________________________

COMPATIBILITY NOTES: This game performs best on high-end smartphones and tablets.
______________________________

WATCH US: www.youtube.com/g5enter

recentChanges: Celebrate Easter with your favorite Mahjong game! Grab this spring update and continue your adventure by matching tiles and traveling through Sweden!

EASTER IN SWEDEN EVENT¬†‚Äì¬†Gather Easter Eggs and travel through 30 new levels on the Swedish village map to get avatars and a Spirit of Easter statuette, which gives you Undo and Shuffle boosters every day.
EXCLUSIVE TILE SET¬†‚Äì¬†Can you match more than 40 new gorgeous tiles?
FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS¬†‚Äì¬†Experience these important optimizations!
summary: Embark on a magical journey in this addictive Mahjong Solitaire adventure!
title: Mahjong Journey¬Æ

comments: Scene animation mouth not talk... Power camera make morre long time for character to show he power need... to dark background need more fix... lamp light not good... im know this is for android its hard to create look like ps4 system engine... anywhere Thanks... human create more shadow on the world... amazing texture... ragdoll good to... ps4 character selection is good... if your can do like ps4 character selection scence when select battle its punch its oppenent thats good.. sorry... im not sure about my english.... Unreal Engine the best... tq... and why ist lag when first play under 5 minutes damn

Happy to see new characters coming in and the game being made more interactive by having leagues and voting for the arena season. Unfortunately at present at gear that I receive from raids in the league or via operations, I am unable to actually view on my roster and upgrade my character. Request you to address this issue.

This game getting worst after every single update. I think the developer doesn't know how to satisfy their audience. They are just ignoring every single feedback made by the audience. They are acting like they are doing much but the reality is that they are doing nothing. They just come up with their silly ideas every single time. I think they should listen to their audience about what they want. Stop acting like a dictator. What I want is that, just be a good listener and try to fix some genuine bugs in the game.

The customer service is the worst you can find anywhere. I wrote to them regarding an issue and I got no reply. I then followed up by replying to the same message 3 times but there was no response for a week. They will never reply to any of your customer service issues. This has happened to me 3 times already. Going to delete the game for sure. Expected much more by WB games.

Loving the game! üòÅ Graphics are great, controls are easy and collecting all my favorite Heroes!   But...  The story mode is not loading :( I can play just fine. But when it comes to loading the actual​ story, it either freezes, or shows only a black screen and I can hear their voices. Sometimes it plays for a seconds and skips to the battle.   How can I fix this?

I lv this game so much,so I give it 4 star. But there have a problem on Story mission. I can't see it,it's all black,there have only SKIP option and all the conversations are heard, after these things the fight is going on,,pls fix it.. I want to see the story.

descriptionHTML:
Who’s in your Justice League? Join your favorite DC Super Heroes & Villains in the best fighting game on mobile. Assemble a team of heroes like Batman, Flash & Wonder Woman to combat the forces against you. Master new combos and crush opponents in dynamic 3-on-3 battles. Upgrade your Super Heroes with special powers as you fight your way through the game. Become a champion by collecting gear for your characters and dominating your foes in PvP contests. Every battle will define you—join the fight and become the ultimate DC champion!

ACTION PACKED COMBAT

• Unleash epic combos on your opponents using Superman’s heat vision, The Flash’s lightning kick, Harley Quinn’s cupcake bomb and much more
• Take your battles to the next level—inflict massive damage using your favorite DC characters’ super moves
• Earn rewards from each fight to customize your Super Heroes with powerful gear, and collect special characters like Armored Superman, Arkham Knight Batman and much more
• Team up with friends and assemble an unstoppable League! Together you can prevent the collection of worlds and defeat the ultimate boss, Brainiac.
• Be social—chat with friends, donate hero shards, participate in Raids, and more!

CONSOLE QUALITY STORY

• Injustice 2 continues the story set in motion in by the hit game Injustice: Gods Among Us
• Immerse yourself in cinematics straight from the console—with the Justice League shattered it is up to you to pick-up the story and unite a team
• Experience the best graphics on mobile—play with Superman, The Flash and many more in high definition combat
• Become the champion the world needs—enter a contest of Super Heroes where only the powerful win

FIGHT YOUR WAY TO THE TOP

• Join the contest—enjoy daily challenges and rise up the leaderboard with every victory
• Enter the PvP arena and fight players around the world to become a champion
• Unite the likes of Flash, Supergirl, Batman and more to fight in epic PvP combat

Join now today and unite YOUR Justice League!

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Injustice2Mobile/
Subscribe on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/InjusticeGame
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Injustice2Go
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/netherrealmstudios/
https://www.injustice.com/mobile

comments: Sometimes it's fun and most of the time will really piss you off. Like as soon as you log in someone has already got 20 kills. Or you get matched up with people that are at a much higher level. It can be very frustrating,  my guess is that there trying to get you to spend lots of money.

I think this game is awesom.. sometimes I get in a shootout and I'm taken out before I can get a shot, that just makes me want to shoot better.. but most the time I'm battling it out till the till the time play stops, then I get to view everyone's score on both teams and see what rank did what.. Not only is this game  challenging and exciting,  but NO ADS.  5 stars from me
Sometimes opponents do not die even after hitting 10-12 headshots.. quiet unfair check on that.. I would give you 5 stars
Everytime I'm on this game I can't put down the phone. I have to charge my phone or I get disconnected by the Wi-Fi Z

Great way to kill time. Not loaded with ads. Easy to earn upgrades. Really fun game. Was fun then came all the useless changes. Points. Cups. Penalties. It is a punishment to build a squad from the ground up these days

This game asks for access to your contacts with the regular excuse that it only for your username. If it is the truth, I will enter my username, but no way i am gonna give you access to my contacts. If you don't give them this access, the game will exit. Deleted.
description: Sniper! Enter the arena and become the #1 SHARPSHOOTER in this thrilling ‚Äòsniper vs. sniper‚Äô LIVE COMBAT game! Compete against more than 500K SNIPERS worldwide, climb the leaderboard, and ENJOY EVERY BATTLE in this premier mobile experience! Feel the pure adrenaline rush, and lifelike combat emotions in the heat of the battlefield, right in your hands on your mobile screen. Jump into the action and join the battle right away, it‚Äôs FREE TO PLAY!‚Ä¢ Enjoy breathtaking 3D GRAPHICS: the world‚Äôs best SNIPER RIFLES, superbly realistic and authentic in every little detail, and 4 spectacular combat locations with authentic sniper firing positions, beautifully designed in terms of game logic and the balance.‚Ä¢ Try intuitively easy controls - SWIPE, ZOOM, SHOOT! Compete in 3 game modes: Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, and Domination with up to 8 real opponents on the map, whoever shoots the most enemies wins the round.‚Ä¢ Develop your SNIPER CAREER, from recruit all the way to the rank of Phantom, with a variety of daily tasks and a detailed ranking system. Unlock and upgrade modern PROFESSIONAL EQUIPMENT: sniper rifles, ammunition, camouflage and special equipment.‚Ä¢ Ally with your friends and create an UNSTOPPABLE SQUAD! Lead them to the top of the leaderboard, defeat other teams and win territories in Domination mode.This game requires stable INTERNET CONNECTION to play. The gameplay involves real-time online match ups with players across the globe, shared server for any mobile device, and LIVE-CHAT.For more info and all the latest news check out: https://www.facebook.com/SniperArenaGame/
descriptionHTML:
Sniper! Enter the arena and become the #1 SHARPSHOOTER in this thrilling ‘sniper vs. sniper’ LIVE COMBAT game! Compete against more than 500K SNIPERS worldwide, climb the leaderboard, and ENJOY EVERY BATTLE in this premier mobile experience! Feel the pure adrenaline rush, and lifelike combat emotions in the heat of the battlefield, right in your hands on your mobile screen. Jump into the action and join the battle right away, it’s FREE TO PLAY!

• Enjoy breathtaking 3D GRAPHICS: the world’s best SNIPER RIFLES, superbly realistic and authentic in every little detail, and 4 spectacular combat locations with authentic sniper firing positions, beautifully designed in terms of game logic and the balance.

• Try intuitively easy controls - SWIPE, ZOOM, SHOOT! Compete in 3 game modes: Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, and Domination with up to 8 real opponents on the map, whoever shoots the most enemies wins the round.

• Develop your SNIPER CAREER, from recruit all the way to the rank of Phantom, with a variety of daily tasks and a detailed ranking system. Unlock and upgrade modern PROFESSIONAL EQUIPMENT: sniper rifles, ammunition, camouflage and special equipment.

comments: The tutorial has a world of flavour and the love put into the story and games comes through. Tons of free packs to get you started in deck building. The gameplay features some classical components of card games with optimized twists using the evolve mechanic and the benefits of a primarily digital card game. I have a really bad phone and it works great since the animations movements and card designs are all in the app.This means that you can use it for an hour offline and it will only use about 10mb. My only thing would be that it seems to drain battery life but then again so do most apps.

Better than Hearthstone in every way except for the UI and friend system. It's also incredibly easy to amass a collection of cards, because this game shoves free packs and gold at you constantly. I gaurantee you'll be impressed with Cygames' generosity. The game itself is way more balanced than Hearthstone and has leaps and bounds better card effects and synergies. Minimal RNG as well. Give it a try.

While the base game is decent, execution leaves a lot to be desired. Get ready to get matched with people way above your rank when starting out and get absolutely swamped. Get ready to have bad cards compared to everyone else already playing. Get ready to loose 5 games and win one making it impossible to do Ur quests to get more cards so you can win more than 1 in 5. This game intentionally wastes Ur time and makes getting free cards absolutely tedious to make you get frustrated to spend real money to buy better cards.

Recently, after the latest update, the app has stopped working. It'll get stuck on ‚Äútap to play‚Äù, which really sucks because it refuses to work on my PC as well. I love playing Shadowverse and I hope I can continue to play it. Please resolve!

This is great ccg game the graphics the animation the evolve and many more but this is just a suggestion to the devs. Can you make also 3 evolve for the first turn player since the 2nd turn player can evolve first than the first player and also the set of cards for the first turn player is also not sure if they can play it on the field.

Down side is the online verses mode aginst real people dont get matched up with same lvl u are like beginner, etc..etc so its not really fair to beginner's. Should have a match up system for beginners and so forth.

comments: This is a fairly clever game, my son (5)and me enjoy the strategy.  Once you learn the importance of each character it becomes even better. The main negative is it's completely fixed to try and lure you to purchase better cards and upgrades. You can win 8 games in a row then you lose them, it's about that number every time, coincendence? I think not. it's very hard to even get to castle 6 and we've been trying for about a month.

Your game server is from the stone age.  Too slow. Ruins the entire game.  You charge money for this game.  At least fix the server. Also opponents get gems faster at times.  Prob server issue also.  Editors choice?  They must of played it for 30 min.  Played for a few months. Fed up with frustration.

1.The player with the highest data speed wins the war. 2.I wish  mana can be looted from opponents. 3.I wish there is a clan war. 4.Some epic cards are too expensive that they can never be owned by poor players.  Just a point of view.
Hey developers I need and improvement. Make another section in the shop where we can see 30sec of video adds to get a reward of 1Ô∏è‚É£ GEM or üíØ COINS. So, what do you say?

descriptionHTML:
Conquer kingdoms and villages in Clash of Kings:The West, a new RTS RPG multiplayer war game that pits your army against friends and enemies all over the world in a battle for towns and cities. Do you have what it takes to crush your enemies in online PVP combat?

Build massive cities and compete in online MMO battles in a classic clash of kings. Reinforce your city and build your town so it’s strong enough to defend itself against evil lords and armies threatening to invade.

Are you ready to join thousands of other lords in a war to control kingdoms? Build up your army, battle enemies and manage your city’s resources to become one of the most powerful lords of all in Clash of Kings:The West !

CLASH OF KINGS:THE WEST FEATURES:
Art of War Strategy Competition
-You can challenge the monster captain with the whole kingdom player. The best strategy master will get awards a week.

Build your city and prepare for action
-You never know when you’ll have to battle against other lords. Your town needs to house a strong army and be well defended in battle. Build your city and upgrade your castle, fortress, army barracks, hospital and more to defend yourself in PVP multiplayer battles. Will you be prepared for action?

Multiplayer PVP war battles online
- You’re not the only person building an empire! Play PVP online against thousands of other players in the best real time strategy MMO game. Prevent a siege by building up your town. Send out your army to take over other cities. Collect their resources and conquer their empire.

MMO universe with massive online battles
- Enter an amazing online world where kingdoms battle for control of a PVP fantasy world. Tactical MMORPG gameplay has you building a kingdom, customizing your armies and collecting resources. Role play your own way in this online multiplayer battle game.

Build strong alliances with others
- Build alliances with other lords and leaders around the world. Clash of Kings:The West is an online RTS MMO RPG that designates you as the army’s leader. Join alliances to help yourself and others. Join like-minded army leaders and help each other build cities, upgrade buildings or battle enemy armies. In this real time strategy game, your alliances can make or break you.

Real-time strategy and resource management
- A strong army needs its food and housing. Build farms and sawmills to gain resources to strengthen your city and your army. Earn coins for every quest completed and resources from every harvest. Build defenses for your city with all of your harvests.

Amazing 3D MMO battles
- Guide your online army across a massive multiplayer world rendered in gorgeous 3D graphics. Watch each battle spring to life as your defenses clash with enemy armies, and each sword swing and arrow shot light up the battlefield.

The bigger you build your empire, the more enemies you create. Other lords of enemies will try and break down your city and your strength in this RTS PVE and PVP MMO war game. Always be ready for action as you march with your army into battle for your land or to take someone else’s.

Are you ready to stand as your town’s leader? Start building your empire and lead your army into epic multiplayer strategy battles today in Clash of Kings:The West !

Download Clash of Kings:The West and join the MMO PVP war!

Need help or more support for this RTS MMO war and army building game?

comments: This game has had me hooked for almost two years now. There is always something to work on and improve. For long time Final Fantasy fans, this is the ultimate fanservice. I found this game to be more nostalgic than even other Final Fantasy crossover games like Dissidia and Theatrhythm. My only gripe is that I wish there was some sort of non-battle exploration aspect. A chance to explore the 3d FF games in 2d, even if they were brief and not the whole worlds, would be a nice touch. Highly recommended if you're looking for an addictive combat-focused rpg to devote yourself to, and super recommended for Final Fantasy fans.

Some minor technical issues with hanging or loading forever screens... but overall superb job with the idea, and best part is not needing to gatcha for your fave ff characters. Prob the least p2win of the top mobile games out there

I would rate it a 5, but the problem is that after the 6/8 update, the game ended up being super slow.  Extremely slow that I had to set my battle speed to 1 just to perform a blatant laggy action.  If you fix this issue, then I'll be happy to re-rate it a 5, but for now, you deserve a 3 unless you resolve it.

A fun game that makes you think about playing other Final Fantasy games. I have become invested in various characters and I am interested in Ffiv. The sprites do not work for all characters as it is hard to see differences between characters such as Vayne and Larsa. The game has missed an opportunity to create a storyline to bring the various games together. However it is a fun game that makes you want to play the full range of the Final Fantasy franchise.

I can't remain as positive as I used to be towards the game. With the various app issues such as excessively long loading times, poor performance, and issues with in-app purchases, I have soured on the game as a whole. The lack of daily missions that the japan side of the game received with the FF3 Onion Knight event that we still haven't received reeks of greed and deprives us of about 100 mythril (the in game currency) compared to where we should be.   The game itself, when it runs properly is still excellent. And it is awesome to use your favorite Final Fantasy characters, or become new fans of some. But DeNA has treated the Global version of the game as an afterthought as of late.

I gave this game 5 stars on EVERYTHING! But... I have some criticism. Some of the dungeons are completely too difficult. I've been playing the game for 2 years now DIEHARD and i still can't get even close to beating some of the bosses.

descriptionHTML:
*** OVER 10 MILLION DOWNLOADS WORLDWIDE ***

Gigantic update!

RELIVE your favorite FINAL FANTASY moments in FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper!

Fight with your favorite FINAL FANTASY heroes, battle through classic FINAL FANTASY moments, restore the lost memories and save the world once again.

=======

"FINAL FANTASY: Record Keeper has single handedly restored my faith as to the potential of this franchise and genre on mobile...” - Touch Arcade

"FINAL FANTASY: Record Keeper takes characters and scenes and mixes them together to form a new experience, giving fans a new way to revisit their favorites.” - GamesBeat

"...must-have for fans of the Final Fantasy series." - CNET, 04/02/15

=======

FEATURES

• RELIVE THE MEMORIES
Battle your way through the most epic FINAL FANTASY moments, woven together for the first time on mobile with an all-new tale! Tyro, a brand new character designed by Tetsuya Nomura, takes center stage!

• CREATE YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM
Put your own twist on the tales: build your fully customized FINAL FANTASY party and lead them to victory! With a massive roster of FINAL FANTASY characters, the possibilities are nearly endless!

• FIGHT THE BATTLES YOUR WAY
Experience the iconic FINAL FANTASY Active Time Battle (ATB) system! YOU control the flow of battle!

• SPECIAL EVENTS
With special events every week, complete new chapters and collect limited edition characters, gear and abilities!

=======

STORY

In a glorious kingdom that thrives on the harmony between magic and art, epic tales of valor and hope have been passed from one generation to the next.

The records of these great chronicles uphold the peace and prosperity of all civilization. The kingdom sealed these records inside paintings, to safeguard the balance of the world.

That is until, without warning, the records within the paintings began to fade away... Darkness fell upon the world, bringing catastrophe and ruin.

The time has come for you to save the kingdom’s future.

Defend Your Legacy.

=======

EXPERIENCE

A bunch of memorable moments are called out from FINAL FANTASY!

FINAL FANTASY VII: Lead AVALANCHE against Shinra, and unravel Sephiroth’s plans…
FINAL FANTASY VIII: Take your place in the elite group SeeD, and recruit the powerful Guardian Forces…
FINAL FANTASY X: Battle Sin, and uncover the mysteries of the lost city of Zanarkand…
FINAL FANTASY XIII: Rise up against the fal’Cie, and discover the true history of the world of Pulse…

And many, many more...


© SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD.
© DeNA Co., Ltd.

descriptionHTML:
Explore the glamorous world of Talking Angela! Adopt baby Angela and make her your very own virtual pet. She's all yours to look after as she grows from kitten to cat. Just watch – she’ll become your new best friend!

Play addictively cute mini-games and collect coins to get cool items for Angela. You’ll just LOVE her wardrobe. That’s where you can DRESS HER UP IN THE LATEST FASHIONS, and then CHOOSE THE PERFECT PAIR OF SHOES to match her outfit. Her shoe collection is incredible! 👠👡👟

Know what else she loves? Makeup! 💄 You can GIVE HER A MAKEOVER whenever you want and make her feel super special. Just pick a lip balm, maybe give her a hint of eye shadow, some mascara, and voila! How cool is that?

Remember to collect coins! You can use them to MAKE ANGELA’S HOME CHIC AND COZY. You can also FEED HER HEALTHY AND DELICIOUS TREATS. 🍹🍉🍓 With your help, Angela can have a fabulous life!❤️

There are all-new cool features to enjoy in My Talking Angela’s latest update as well, including NEW REWARDS, STICKER SWAPS, GIFTS, EASTER DISCOUNTS, AND MORE! And don’t forget to add some seasonal sparkle to her life with the gorgeous Magic Sparkle Outfit. 👗 Make Angela your very own superstar!

FRIENDSHIP, FASHION, AND FUN ALL FOR YOU, ALL THE TIME!

ADOPT BABY ANGELA
Adopt Angela as your very own virtual pet and give her a fabulous life! Help her grow into a stylish city kitty. From teeth brushing to clothes shopping – she’s all yours!

TAKE CARE OF HER
Make Angela your very own superstar! Nurture her, sing to her, and feed her delicious treats. Just watch – she’ll become your new best friend!

CREATE COLORFUL MAKEUP LOOKS
Let your stunning sense of style shine and give Angela a makeover! Lipstick, eyeshadow, blush - you can customize her look to your heart's content! There are dozens of different colors to choose from so you can really express yourself!

EXPRESS YOUR FLAIR FOR FASHION
You’re fabulous, so make Angela fabulous too! Dress her in the latest fashions and the cutest costumes, from beautiful ballerina outfits to punk ninja clothes! Complete the look by giving her the perfect hairstyle too! With over a million different fashion combinations, you can make her look however you want!

COLLECT STICKERS
As you help Angela grow and progress through the levels, you will collect super cool stickers that you can stick in your album and even swap with your friends. It’s loads of fun!

PLAY MINI-GAMES
Discover and play amazing new mini-games! From Happy Connect and Bubble Shooter to Tiny Puzzles, all your favorites are here… and more are added all the time!

AND MUCH MUCH MORE...
Unlock exclusive new outfits, level up, collect special stickers, customize her fabulous home, and more! All while she repeats everything you say in classic Talking Angela style!

DOWNLOAD FOR FREE AND START PLAYING MY TALKING ANGELA NOW! MAKE HER YOUR SUPERSTAR!


This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbour seal indicates Outfit7 has established COPPA-compliant privacy practices to protect your child’s personal information. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising;

- Personalisation of content to encourage users to play the app again;

- Items to purchase, available for different prices in virtual currency, depending on the current level reached by the player; and
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchase using real money (level progress, games, in-game functionalities, ads, etc.).

descriptionHTML:
Build, collect and quest with your favorite Family Guy heroes and villains in a freakin’ hilarious new sandbox game!

Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates!

After another epic battle with the giant chicken, Peter Griffin has accidentally destroyed Quahog! Play for FREE and rally your favorite FG characters (even Meg) to save the city in a hilarious new adventure from the writers of Family Guy. Or don’t, and regret it forever! 

Quest for Stuff Features: 

• It’s Free! Freakin’ free? Freakin’ sweet! 
• Build a living Quahog that fits enjoyably in your pants 
• Collect hilarious outfits for your characters like Mermaid Peter, Bikini-Clad Quagmire, and Rambo Lois 
• Quest with FG characters and win ridiculous prizes
• Defend Quahog from pirates, evil chickens, and other invasions 
• Peterfy your town with decorations such as The Petercopter, The Peterdactyl, and The Hindenpeter 
• Collect hundreds of brand new and classic animations 

Build a city with Peter Griffin and all of your favorite Family Guy characters! What could possibly go wrong?

PS: You can play this game in French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, and Brazilian Portuguese! 

PPS: Don’t forget to watch new episodes of Family Guy on Sundays - only on FOX! 

Check out all the latest news & updates for Family Guy: The Quest for Stuff: 
• Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/playfamilyguy 
• Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/playfamilyguy 
• Follow Peter on Instagram: www.instagram.com/peterpumpkineater69 
• Check out awesome Family Guy clips, episodes, pictures, and more: www.fox.com/family-guy
developerAddress:
225 Bush Street
Suite 1900
San Francisco CA
94104
recentChanges: Peter and Lois are opening up a food truck! But will a falling out between the two and a competition to put the other out of business tear their family apart?
Serve up requested dishes to hungry customers!
Consult culinary gurus like Guy Fieri!
It's out of the frying pan, into the fire when there's "Too Many Griffins in the Kitchen"!
summary: Build a City & Collect FG Heroes in a Hilarious Sandbox Building Sim. Play FREE!
title: Family Guy The Quest for Stuff

comments: I have had to rewrite my review. The game issues have been corrected And everyone has been very well compensated.
It's a good game especially if you want to play for free it's not like the mainstream games like Game of War Fire Age or Mobile Strike which is a good thing

Timers are stopped 1second every 3seconds to stop players complete challenges in time and this makes a temptation to purchase and if you don't buy packets they make sure they play with your app and make it impossible to play unless you start buying.another ruthless even worse than mobilestrike.AVOID,AVOID AVOID PLAYING
Every time I want to go on the app it doesn't load and I have to delete APP and re- install . It's ridiculous.
Purchased a game pack last night never recieved my pack. Want a refund
I highly recommend this game compared to similar games but it's still early days.
description: War Games - Commander War Games - Commander is a real-time navy strategy MMO game and offers the ultimate experience for users who love naval battle. Play For Free Now! Players battle enemies to build and grow their city and their empire. Join the alliance and team up with friends from all around the world to fight enemies and participate in events. Take part in brutal battles, or focus on gathering the resources you need to support your troops and grow your city. The life or death of your city is in your hands. The strategy you use to survive is up to you!Game Features:* Best Free-to-play Strategy MMO ever!* Plentiful well-known powerful Warships: Battleships/Submarines/Frigates/Aircraft Carriers are waiting your order.* Play with millions of other players, attack them and reap resources. * Upgrade buildings and warships to strengthen your empire. * Build strong alliances to conquer enemies and become the most POWERFUL Alliance of the world.War Games - Commander is completely free to play, however some game items still can be purchased with real money. If you don‚Äôt want to use this feature, please disable this function in your device or the setting of store.
descriptionHTML:
War Games - Commander

War Games - Commander is a real-time navy strategy MMO game and offers the ultimate experience for users who love naval battle.
Play For Free Now!

Players battle enemies to build and grow their city and their empire. Join the alliance and team up with friends from all around the world to fight enemies and participate in events. Take part in brutal battles, or focus on gathering the resources you need to support your troops and grow your city. The life or death of your city is in your hands. The strategy you use to survive is up to you!

Game Features:
* Best Free-to-play Strategy MMO ever!
* Plentiful well-known powerful Warships: Battleships/Submarines/Frigates/Aircraft Carriers are waiting your order.
* Play with millions of other players, attack them and reap resources.
* Upgrade buildings and warships to strengthen your empire.
* Build strong alliances to conquer enemies and become the most POWERFUL Alliance of the world.

War Games - Commander is completely free to play, however some game items still can be purchased with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable this function in your device or the setting of store.

comments: Downgraded to 2 Stars from 5. You would think by signing into Gmail AND Facebook. The game would save progress. Especially since it does not state that the game will not save account. That it is locally stored in device. Weird being an online game. Got a new phone. Moved Date and Apps over. Erased to Factory setting. Logged in on new phone. No progress! Signed into Facebook and gmail. No progress! Submitted 3 Tickets on lost account. No reply! 2 Stars! Should at least let people know when signing in to Facebook and gmail it won't save progress. What's even the point in signing into those then? Spent money and lost progress!

First of all first of all I'm a I think the mission could have been longer a little easier for you know some people that don't have the cash right now to spend begin with but everything's cool it's a cool game definitely not cute I mean cool
Game is skewed towards big money spenders only. You want free play, look for something else. Don't waste your money and time here.

Great game! But it could add some quite big updates to make it awesome. If you add a big update with cool stuff etc, then do a ad about it, I think you could get alot of downloader, just don't make it stupid like those weird new ones, make it interesting. descriptionHTML:
League of War: Mercenaries is an exciting war strategy game where you can make choices that have real impact and outcomes. Immerse yourself in this 3D war game to build your base, grow your army, and battle your way to victory.

3D battlefield mixed with a unique tug of war deck-based combat system, giving you an exciting tactical war strategy game that will keep you playing for days! Build a fighting force of extraordinary magnitude to wage war on corporations and nations. Take on hundreds of missions or compete with fellow Mercenaries to claim victory around the globe and enjoy the spoils of war!

In League of War: Mercenaries, players act as mercenaries, taking on military contractors that play out on the battlefield to claim victory around the globe. Upgrade your army with futuristic tech, battle your enemies, and come out on top in this tactical war.

= LEAGUE OF WAR: MERCENARIES FEATURES =

3D GAME - EXPERIENCE A LUSH 3D BATTLEFIELD
★ Battle your way through stunning 3D content, from your military headquarters to intensely fast-paced combat!
★ 3D war visuals with stunning, visceral combat that plays out in real time

WAR STRATEGY - YOUR CHOICES HAVE AN IMPACT
★ Build and strengthen your army with tanks, helicopters, infantries and more.
★ Strategize the units you use to ensure your victory on the battlefield
★ Advanced warfare tech will help you dominate your enemies and rule the planet
★ Strategy and tactics will make your army the strongest

REAL TIME STRATEGY COMBAT – UPDATE TACTICS IN REAL TIME
★ Tactical wars have enveloped the world. Battle for control in intense RTS combat!
★ RTS games challenge you to strategically configure and prepare your squad in a variety ways to counter sophisticated enemy units
★ Real time strategy combat challenges you to always stay one step ahead of your enemy

BASE BUILDING - EXPAND & UPGRADE MILITARY HEADQUARTERS
★ Build and upgrade the ultimate military HQ with sophisticated base building tools
★ Defend your base by leveling up your military fortress
★ Building games lovers will really enjoy this fast paced, action packed RTS

AMRY UPGRADES – BUILD A BETTER MILITARY
★ Armies are upgradeable so you can always utilize new tactics
★ Tanks, aircraft and more are at your disposal as you clash with enemies

UPGRADE MERCENARIES - CUSTOMIZE MILITARY UNITS
★ Upgrade & equip units with a vast array of technology for specific roles to defeat your enemy!
★ Build your army, from tanks to infantry, and put a personal stamp on your mercenaries
★ Mercenaries grow stronger as you gain new tech and tactics

ALLIANCE BUILDING - FORGE STRATEGIC ALLIANCES
★ Alliances let you bring your military might down on enemies
★ Online multiplayer - Create an Alliance and band together against enemy for powerful rewards!
★ Play with friends! Join your friends for deeper engagements and battle together

MULTIPLAYER MODE - TEST YOUR STRATEGY IN 2 PLAYER BATTLES
★ Defend your base and battle to be the best!
★ Multiplayer war breaks out across the world. Will you come out on top?
★ PVP combat challenges you to earn valuable loot by defeating fellow players in head-to-head battle!

Defense and offense are critical – which strategy will you use to conquer the world?

Battle to conquer the world with advanced warfare tactics and a powerful army of infantry, tanks and helicopters. Combat multiplayer opponents in PVP strategy games, build the ultimate base and lead your team of mercenaries to global domination.

Download League of War: Mercenaries and become King of the mercenaries!

Watch us on YouTube: youtube.com/MunkyFunGames
